name: 28 Babes Later
description: Play as a determined survivor navigating a zombie-infested world to rescue your 28 girlfriends. Armed with love and an arsenal of weapons, you must battle hordes of the undead. Will your love conquer the apocalypse?

name: 2045, Tsuki yori.
description: Sin descripción

name: Blouncy
description: Be a block! Do the bounce! Don't Die!

name: Dorasyeoda
description: 「Dorasyeoda」 is a 3D Mystery & Detective game set in a dystopian world, which is based on a virtual history of the Joseon Dynasty.

name: Great Naval Battles: The Final Fury
description: Battlestations! All hands prepare for the naval conflict on a truly grand scale! Great Naval Battles: The Final Fury is loaded with enough historical and hypothetical naval conflict to keep players - from casual to connoisseur - busy for hours and hours!

name: Leap up no Justu: Double
description: Leap up no jutsu: Double is the next version of the game Leap up no Jutsu. From now on, you must control two characters to avoid obstacles at the same time by clicking on the side where the character needs to jump.Enjoy!

name: Krampen
description: Immerse yourself in the winter forest and help a lost soul to find a piece of itself. What is awaiting you there.. or who?

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra2P
description: A port of Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra2S for the PlayStation 4 with enhanced image and sound quality.

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1P
description: A port of Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1S for the PlayStation 4 with enhanced image and sound quality.

name: Costume Fighter
description: Get ready to brawl in this side-splitting showdown where fighters don't just bring their fists to the fight, but their wackiest costumes and zaniest moves.

name: Futanari College: Episode 1
description: Futanari College is an adult Visual Novel in witch you take control of an 20 year old guy whose life is turned up side down when he went to college where only futa-girls study. Will he be fun for the girls or will he find true love?

name: Crying Alone
description: Dive into 'Crying Alone', a 20-minute narrative-driven game that reflects my personal journey through heartbreak and healing. Experience the raw emotions of loss, the struggle for acceptance, and the first steps towards recovery in this poignant story.

name: Santa's World
description: A family friendly Christmas platformer

name: Recoil
description: Recoil is a minimalist 2D Platformer where you can only move by shooting. Find ways to escape the prison by solving puzzles and blasting (or sparing) enemies while collecting all the gems! But beware, The Wardens are watching...

name: Christmas Runner
description: "Christmas Runner - Rocket Boot Adventure" is an exciting Christmas-themed parkour game where players become a rocket boot runner, navigating diverse terrains, overcoming various obstacles, and pushing their limits.

name: Project Arcade
description: Project Arcade currently contains a simple yet responsive card matching memory game, with progressively challenging levels, pairs or triples modes, and an automatic save system.

name: Tangles
description: Awakening from a long coma following a training injury, Soldier Basel finds himself alone in an isolated camp on a deserted island surrounded by questions and mystery. Dive into a quest for answers, and the discovery of enigmatic secrets.

name: Nebel Geisterjäger: The First Lamb
description: An NTRPG from a male POV. Use tools like heart monitoring and surveillance to shield your girlfriend, Kana, from her scheming boss. With 5 endings and choices shaping interactions, can you keep her safe? Amidst exorcism, intrigue, and personal choices, protect your bond and confront inner desires.

name: Tale of the Shadow World
description: Walking through the forest, the girl found an interesting book, after reading which her world turned upside down for a while. And maybe forever. The shadow flowers gently whispered to her, luring her further into the darkness. Will she be able to bear the moral of this tale?

name: The Arrogant Kaiju Princess and The Detective Servant
description: Living as a slave to the Monster Princess in a colorful cohabitation lifestyle! An enriching and exciting time management love development game.

name: Hop! Step! Dance!
description:
A spin-off of the Fitness Boxing series, Hop! Step! Dance! is a dancing lessons game teaching players different movement and choreography with a 30-step course covering 84 lessons created by a professional dancing instructor.

The game has 2 new instructors for the main lessons with 2 additional instructions, Rin and Hiro from Fitness Boxing 2, as part of the practical "free" and "stretch" modes. The free mode has 6 original dances with speed settings and practice options for the different parts.

name: Spy x Anya: Operation Memories
description:
Play as Anya and experience the world of SPYxFAMILY in its first console-game! Anya Forger has received a new assignment from school: create a photo diary of memories.

On weekdays, head to class in the morning, then enjoy family time in the evening.

On weekends, visit all sorts of exciting places, like the beach or art museums, in search of subjects worthy of photographing!

What kind of photo diary will you help Anya create?

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Quan Chi
description:
Now a master of the Netherrealm's most vile sorcery, Quan Chi plots with Shang Tsung to conquer the realms. This pack includes playable character Quan Chi including all new move-sets.

Quan Chi is a returning character previously playable in Mortal Kombat X as part of the main roster.

name: Envoy
description: You have been created by a mysterious monolith with a single goal: to retrieve five force crystals back to it as quickly as possible. Deal with the plights of space physics, evade the locals, and complete your mission as soon as possible.

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Florida
description: Unleash your inner angler in Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Florida DLC! Sail to Dry Tortugas, snag Black sea bass, Tarpon, and more on your own boat. Adventure awaits!

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Florida
description: Unleash your inner angler in Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Florida DLC! Sail to Dry Tortugas, snag Black sea bass, Tarpon, and more on your own boat. Adventure awaits!

name: Pandemommyum! Hot Single Moms in My Area
description: Your tomboy neighbour will stop at nothing until she proves you're good enough to get a harem. Even if girl #2 is your boss! A ridiculous +18 comedy visual novel that just might win you over!

name: Krampen
description: Krampen is a horror-adventure game in which you will immerse yourself in a winter forest and help a lost soul regain a piece of itself. Uncover all the secrets that go beyond the gaming experience and discover the truth about the main character!

name: Scientifically Accurate Dinosaur Mating Simulator 2022: American Revolution 1775 - 1786: Scientifically Accurate Dinosaur Mating Simulator 2023: French Revolution 1789 - 1799
description: First, the dinosaurs came for the American Revolution, and I said nothing, because I was a gamer and I wanted to play that game. Then, they came for the French Revolution, and I said nothing, because I was a gamer and that sounded ridonkulous as well.

name: Oslo: 2084
description: In OSLO:2084, hack your way through a dystopian world where AI rules supreme and democracy is a distant memory. As Embla, fight for freedom and change the course of history in this thrilling cyberpunk adventure.

name: One.
description: One. is a remake of the 1999 visual novel One: Kagayaku Kisetsu he, developed by Nexton's sub-brand novamicus for the company's 30th anniversary.

name: Wolf Souls
description: Dark and unforgiving world of Wolf Souls, a Souls-like RPG where you play as a strong woman battling challenging bosses with magic and a variety of weapons.

name: Detective: Stella Porta case
description: Detective: Stella Porta Case, puts you in the shoes of a detective who investigates three strange disappearances. In all cases there is a contract signed by the disappeared, that contract is from an organization called "Stella Porta".

name: Centipede Gun
description: Centipede Gun is a roguelite autobattler where you create bizzare creatures to face hordes of enemies! Combine different guns, modules and skills to make unique synergies and upgrade your cute little destruction machine!

name: Heroes of Holdem
description:
Heroes of Holdem is here to provide unique gameplay experience by melding the immensly popular foundation gameplay of Texas Hold’em poker with fantasy world and immersive gameplay of role playing games.

Heroes of Holdem was designed and created from the ground up by a team of blockchain enthusiasts who wanted to bring a unique vision and take on the wildly popular game of Texas Holdem to the blockchain and gaming community.

name: Punzel: Chapter I - Toujours la Meme Histoire
description: Imagine you are a captured princess...but the hero never arrives. Join Punzel in her adventure of trying to escape her tower prison. Experience the boredom of captivity, the daily frustrations of haggling with your captors and crows. Lots of crows.

name: Path of the Abyss
description: Dive deep into the ABYSS.

name: Woe
description: Dismantle horrific monsters in real-time gallery combat, descending through random dungeons in search of new weapons, tools, and bizarre artifacts to stave off death a little longer. Woe to all who enter...

name: Photoelektric
description: Photoelektric is an atmospheric, VR platformer experience. Using physics-based movement control scheme, you will illuminate your path though a 3-dimensional world by solving puzzles and avoiding enemies.

name: Jinshin
description:
Jinshin is a JRPG based on an ancient-themed fantasy tale of when Kami deities lived alongside humans.
Mikazuchi, a man of sword mastery and wisdom, joins the Amaterasu Clan to save his master from Onigami Ichigan, the head of an ominous force. When the war is done, will peace or chaos reign supreme?
Make use of tactician Mikazuchi's orders and gain powerful formation effects to turn the tide of battle in turn-based battles full of ambiance and strategy. Use materials to craft equipment and unlock Kami Arts within weapons to unleash extremely powerful skills. Learn magic arts from Tsukumo Kami hiding all over the world, and focus on developing your village through commands to receive rewards and learn new crafting formulas.

name: Prince of Suburbia
description: Prince of Suburbia is a kinetic adult visual novel with only one thing on its mind. This simple sandbox game is packed with lewd scenes and sprinkled with a fun story that aims to never leave you wanting more.

name: Girls' Frontline 2: Exilium
description: GIRLS' FRONTLINE 2: EXILIUM is the official sequel to the mobile game Girls' Frontline. It is a brand-new 3D Strategy RPG available for both mobile devices and PC, featuring a Non-Photorealistic Rendering (NPR) art style based on Physically Based Rendering (PBR) technology. The core gameplay focuses on turn-based tactics, while incorporating collection and RPG elements.

name: Shadow of Valhalla
description: Visceral physics-based VR combat set within an ancient realm of Viking lore and mystic powers! Discover magical runes and unlock spells while battling evil forces throughout eternity!

name: World Warfare & Economic
description: Control Any Country and Lead Her to Greatness. Modify Laws, Control The Economy, Build Facilities, Produce and Trade Resources, Make Diplomatic Relations With Other Countries, Build Military Bases, Fight Wars, Conquer Regions and Lead Your Population.

name: Automatrons
description: Join our machine legion to conquer the world.

name: Siege the Day
description: Siege the Day is a tactical turn-based combat castle builder game. Take control of your castle's defenses and fortifications. Engage in epic 1-on-1 battles! Build your ultimate castle and use catapults, cannons, magic spells, and dragons to wage war against other players.

name: Empires and Tribes
description: Empires and Tribes is a unique hybrid of a medieval city builder and a role-playing game. You will undertake the duties of a mayor in the 13th century and manage the expansion of your city, ensure the production of resources and raise a powerful army to protect yourself from rival principalities.

name: Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory
description: Lead a team of four Troubleshooters of dubious loyalty, who (mostly) obey orders from Friend Computer, a paranoid and irrational artificial intelligence. Inspired by the classic games of the CRPG genre, experience the first official adaptation of the cult role-playing game!

name: Go Go Magnet!
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite: Chill Vibez Pack
description:
Two things that Reverie lives for: good vibez and sweet dreamz. Vibe out with the Chill Vibez Pack. Includes an Outfit with LEGO Style, Back Bling, Pickaxe, Wrap and 600 V-Bucks.

V-Bucks included with this purchase can't be transferred to or used on Nintendo Switch.

description: Grappling Hook Legendary Skin [Flying Squirrel]

description: Valda Cui Legendary Outfit [Justice·Gossamer Iris], Valda Cui Legendary Hairstyle [Justice·Raptor]

description: Justina Gu Legendary Outfit [She Ethnic·Phoenix Princess], Justina Gu Legendary Accessory [She Ethnic·Phoenix Crown], Justina Gu Epic Hairstyle [Phoenix Song]

name: Naraka: Bladepoint - Iris' Whisper Pack
description: Tarka Ji Legendary Outfit [Justice·Iris' Whisper], Tarka Ji Legendary Hairstyle [Justice·Hue]

name: The Callisto Protocol: Biophage Skin
description: Wear the Biophage Skin Collection, a new cosmetic set for your player, weapons, and gear.

name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Imoen Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Imoen (if you don't already own them) Mind Flayer Imoen Skin An Epic Feat for Imoen 7 Gold Imoen Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Wyll Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Wyll (if you don't already have them) Mind Flayer Wyll Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Wyll 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Wyll Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Fernbus Simulator: Altano TDX
description: Two particularly outstanding variants of the Altano TDX with an incomparable feature for maximum travel comfort: TDX20, TDX21!

name: Fernbus Simulator: Astromega
description: The Astromega - a top class double-decker that not only shines with its impressive design, but also offers generous space and comfort for a stylish trip across Europe.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Altano TX
description: Experience the Altano TX with three fully functional and intricately detailed variants, each offering numerous features for a unique driving experience.

name: Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099: Two Cage Seasoning Pack
description: Arriving on December 13th, this 1st DLC will be absolutely FREE!

name: Gnomes Garden Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Bitosphere
description: Embark on a Galactic Adventure in Bitosphere a Captivating 1-bit Clicker Game

name: Outpost Auriga IV
description: Originally it was meant to be a speedbase map but quickly turned into a mixture of textures.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Shimmns-ttu Wagon Pack
description: Bring your railroads to life with this Shimmns-ttu Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads.

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 4
description: "Explore the beauty of the United States with 'USA Jigsaw Puzzles.' Piece together iconic scenes, from cityscapes to natural wonders. Choose your difficulty, unlock panoramic views, and enjoy stunning artwork.

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: "Explore the beauty of the United States with 'USA Jigsaw Puzzles.' Piece together iconic scenes, from cityscapes to natural wonders. Choose your difficulty, unlock panoramic views, and enjoy stunning artwork.

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: "Explore the beauty of the United States with 'USA Jigsaw Puzzles.' Piece together iconic scenes, from cityscapes to natural wonders. Choose your difficulty, unlock panoramic views, and enjoy stunning artwork.

name: Frost
description: Frost is a 4 level set based around snow, ice, and old creaky castles. Heavily inspired by Maskim Xul and the works of Eternal

name: Outpost 13
description: The Outpost 13 is a huge reference to The Thing, the 1982 John Carpenter movie. Boom compatible with approximately 15 minutes of gameplay.﻿

name: Cherry Tower
description: Enter the world of Cherry Tower, a charming 2D pixel platformer that will take you on a sweet adventure unlike any other! Join Cherry on her small adventure climbing tower to return home and maybe even more. Overcome obstacles and traps to achieve your goals.

name: Draco D
description: Draco D, a casual dragon arcade game where players soar through enchanting levels, unleashing unique breath weapons and collecting magical power-ups to conquer foes. Maneuver through perilous obstacles, defeat monsters for rewards, and aim for high scores in this exhilarating quest.

name: High School Private Tutor
description: You’re a gifted college student carefully balancing your studies with a part-time tutoring gig until an offer lands in your lap that just might be too good to be true. When your seemingly shy high school tutee falls head over heels for you during the very first lesson together, you’re suddenly thrust into a situation where your head is at war with your heart and your future may just be on the line if word of it ever gets out.

name: Apple Boy 2: Homebound Hero
description:
After the events of Apple Boy: Attack of Ice Cream Man, Apple Boy's been sent to the fantastic world of Teylornia! He doesn't want to be there, though, so after getting a helpful tip from a bald olding man, he sets out to collect the 12 Teleportation Gems, so he can get home to his beloved Fruitbowl City.

This hack has 45 exits.

name: Big Fat Battle: Starter Pack
description: This Pack includes 3 Exclusive Characters each with their own melee weapon.

name: Big Fat Battle: Big Pack
description: This Pack includes 6 Exclusive Characters each with their own melee weapon.

name: Rhythm Journey
description: A vertical rhythm game created by students in the Game Arts Department. All of the music used is original by students.

name: Princess Puzzle Adventure
description: Embark on a royal journey with "Princess Puzzle Adventure," a captivating jigsaw puzzle game that brings the magic of fairy tales to life.

name: Super Liftpia
description: Pick up the enemy and throw it! This is an action game drawn with dots that gives you a nostalgic feel.

name: Christmas Girls
description: It's Christmas time! Everyone is looking forward to it, including our girls! They have already put on their Christmas hats, so they are ready!

name: Journey to the Wand
description: "Journey to the Wand" is a delightful experience for those interested in platform games. The struggle to retrieve Elowen's wand will offer players a unique adventure, and the captivating story of the game will immerse players from beginning to end.

name: Dark Forest
description: You searching for secret treasure.You being confronted by mysterious creatures, guards and gods.The only way to get away is to destroy everything stands against you.A forest in darkness which had been kept secret, protected and laid the in middle of internal conflict. You ready for the adventure?

name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange
description: Set out on an adventurous journey, searching for capybaras with orange during both day and night in this exceptional hidden object game.

name: Orbius
description: Orbius is a suika-like, rogue-lite casual game where the goal is to get the highest score possible. As your score rises, you must select spells that make furthering the game more and more difficult. Will you master Orbius?

name: Star Ship Survivor
description: Player move ship and dock with blocks. This docking will be on contacted position, so your ship can be ugly shap. But if your control was good at moving ship, your ship will be cool. Try this trip and survive. And if you can, try making cool shape ship.

name: Oil Coin
description: A game in which you need to explore new oil fields. For this you will have different ways, such as moles, geologists and so on. Build towers, oil storages, pump your production, improve buildings and warehouses. Hire workers, guards, fight off or buy off raiders. Buy new lands.

name: OG Memory: Fall 2K23
description: OG Memory: Fall 2K23 is an casual memory game with stunning leafs images made in Fall 2023. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Rogue Slime
description: Rogue Slime: An engaging isometric 2D roguelike adventure where you maneuver a slime character through dynamic dungeons, utilizing slime ball attacks and a variety of power-ups to overcome diverse enemies and evolving challenges.

name: Kill Santa
description: Santa has been a naughty fellow this year. Kill him and his helpers before things get out of hand!

name: OG Puzzlers: Fall 2K23
description: OG Puzzlers: Fall 2K23 is an casual puzzel game stunning images of coloured leafs made in fall 2023. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: OG Memory: Kira Maus
description: OG Memory: Kira Maus is an casual memory game with cute dog images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Genshin Impact: Roses and Muskets
description:
Version 4.3 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Navia and Chevreuse
• New main event: Roses and Muskets
• New story quest for Navia
• Major update for Genius Invokation TCG
• Major update for the Serenitea Pot housing system
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Sexy Santa
description: Sexy Santa is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about a guy calling home a prostitute who was wearing a Santa suit. She saw his small cock, and refused to suck it! But our hero didn't let it go unpunished!

name: Taxi Taxi Taxi
description: Drive around in your taxi on a 1.5 square KM island and pick up passengers.

name: Genius Moves!
description: Guide adorable animals through 100 relaxing yet brain-teasing levels. Program their way by strategically arranging action blocks to help them collect their favorite food. Explore 4 delightful worlds, collect cute critters, and enjoy the perfect blend of simplicity and puzzle-solving excitement!

name: Fifteen
description: Welcome to ‘Fifteen', where each swipe is a brushstroke on a canvas of endless possibilities. With intuitive mouse controls, explore diverse themes across multiple levels. Immerse yourself in the revolutionary 3D 360-degree perspective, redefining puzzle-solving in a visually immersive experience

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jikenbo Vol. 13 - Tasogare ha Ruri no Tsuioki
description: What if I had made a different choice then? The truth and consequences of memory.

name: Shape of Clouds
description: Welcome to Shape of Clouds, where every twist and turn unveils a masterpiece. Your mission is to revive arts in Shape of Clouds by rotate pieces, restore pictures in diverse themes and let your imagination soar.

name: Pixsaw
description: Arrange pieces to their letters and discover a beautiful hidden image. Pixsaw combines classic jigsaw and color-by-number genres to create a whole new type of puzzle that will give you a joyful surprise every time you create a masterpiece pixel artwork!

name: Bigfoot's Journey
description:
Learn about a real Bigfoot - a creature that has learned to hide, survive and travel through other dimensions, and guide him through the mazes.

Among the most important events of the twentieth century, three stand out: man went into space; man has been to the moon; the man became convinced that he was not the only possessor of intelligence on Earth.

Years have passed. The planet is in the middle of the 21st century. Humanity is on the verge of extinction. Nuclear winter is raging. Officially, hominology is listed as a pseudoscience, but in fact it is the most important scientific discipline, because the object of its study is real.

name: Nexus Travelers: Hero of Elocea
description: Travel to another world and save it! Will you be able to win the favor of the princess and her people and get some well-deserved 'rewards'? Visual Novel with quests, turn-based combat and animated, interactive scenes.

name: SkyBound
description: Skybound is an adrenaline-pumping 2D platformer that challenges players to conquer the sky. With precise controls, and perilous obstacles, this game offers an experience where timing and skill determine success. players embark on a journey navigating intricate platforms, and evading hazardous traps.

name: Few Nights More: Genesis
description: ThFew Nights More is a roguelike turn-based RPG based in a world where Vampire Lords seek to conquer lost territories and their place in the world. Design and defend your stronghold, slay your enemies with traps, and fulfill your Lord’s true potential, slowly conquering what is rightfully yours.

name: Finite State Automaton Challenges 2
description: In the second episode of Finite State Automation Challenges, you will use finite-state automata to overcome 40 challenges from character string manipulation, computer science, and mathematics.

name: Diabetor & The Sugar Monsters
description: DIABETOR AND THE SUGAR MONSTERS! Diabetor was wreaking havoc on diabetics across the nation. The world needed a hero! Years ago the Insulator read a book that held the secret on how to defeat Diabetor. It is now time to defeat Diabetor and his evil sugar monsters!

name: The First Present
description: For this christmas you want to please your mother with the greatest gift. Gather your courage and explore this uncanny forest to find your objective. But be carefull of your environment, do not loose too much time and find your way back before IT catch you !

name: The Rumble Fish +
description: The fight for survival has returned.

name: Stealth Blade
description: Stealth Blade is a side-scrolling action/dark art-style game. You need to save your son from demons.

name: Titan Revenge
description: Set in the vast expanse of Norse mythology, this MMORPG thrusts you into a world on the brink of apocalypse. As an intrepid hero, you must navigate the realms of the Aesir and Vanir, battling fearsome giants, mythical beasts, and treacherous gods.

name: Triadino
description: Triadino is a casual puzzle game inspired by Tetris and Rock-Paper-Scissors. Unique interactions between typed blocks make the game more interesting and challenging.

name: Grand War: Rome - Free Strategy Game
description: A turn-based strategy war chess game. You will play a commander in the Roman period, and command the generals and troops to complete the specified mission objectives and occupy important strongholds in the level. Rome, Samnite, Epirus, Carthage. Different choices will open different histories!

name: Love Poem Written For a Fairy
description: A poet met a beautiful and charming fairy on the edge of the human and demon worlds..... Poets have no other choice but to pursue love poems.

name: Micro Macro Farm
description: Micro macro farm is a small relaxing and cozy game about farming. Plant seeds, harvest them and create products. Make money and gain experience to unlock more seeds, buy machines and expand your garden.

name: Desk of Desires: VR Office Sex
description: Step into a world where office fantasies and erotic desires come to life with "Desk of Desires: VR Office Sex." This immersive adult VR game takes you on an electrifying journey into the secret world of professional passion.

name: Fiora Arc
description: Go through the complex life of B as he struggles to balance his life between the island that calls to him, and fighting his way to the top of the gangs of Cardigan.

name: Cosmic Armada
description: A fleet combat and space exploration game. Pilot ships, control a fleet, build and upgrade colonies, mine resources, craft items, trade, upgrade your ships and fleet, carry out missions, board ships, destroy ships and get revenge on the empire that conquered your home planet.

name: Diggy Diggy Dwarf
description: Rise like the hero when your teammates need it, survive monsters, search for treasure, smelt, forge and create in this game like no other. Will you become the richest and strongest dwarf? Can you manage to be the best by reaching an unmatched status of greatness among the dwarves?

name: Deidthraw
description: Deidthraw is a first person endless shooter with rogue-lite elements set in a fantasy style 1940's era Scotland. Fight, Upgrade, Build defences and Survive against the hordes in Deidthraw. How long will you make it?

name: Tiger Blade
description: Tiger Blade‘s story casts players in the role of a deadly assassin working for the Horangi chapter of the Tiger Clans. Ordered to steal a mysterious package from a rival chapter, you are shocked to find the object of the heist is a tiger cub. Thought to be extinct for a hundred years, the mythical creature is now desired by every gang in Sewoon and they’ll stop at nothing to take it from you.

name: Cave Digger 2
description: Cave Digger 2 is an action-adventure game in wildland valleys where you explore old mines, nautical caves and ruins of ancient civilizations inspired by western, dieselpunk and Lovecraftian themes.

name: Ep. Kazoku
description: A first-person Japanese horror game.

name: Aery: Calm Mind 4
description: Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself in beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Toy Racer Turbo Wheels: Playground Zone
description: Join the thrilling fun in Toy Racer Turbo Wheels: Playground Zone! Race adorable toy cars in a vibrant playground setting, speed through loops, ramps, and obstacles, and experience fast-paced challenges. Test your skills, upgrade your cars, and reign supreme in this miniaturized racing adventure!

name: Garten of Banban 6
description: Explore the forgotten levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the new terrors that reside below. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Your Journey of Survival
description: Your Journey of Survival is an open world, sandbox game, mixing together the best elements of FPS, Survival, Tower Defense, and RPG games.

name: Lazarus A.D. 2222
description: The final part of the Sons of Welder game series, set in a dystopian universe, which uniquely combines games from the Magnus series. A game that you can experience on two levels. Hand-drawn motion comics. A metaphorical journey into oneself. A mystical experience with a touch of good humor.

name: Zombie Survival Game Online
description: In ZSGO, you and your fellow survivors wield the ingenuity, firepower, and courage to navigate a post-apocalyptic world crawling with the living dead. Treacherous landscapes, hidden resources, and untold stories waiting to be discovered! But remember, you are never safe – stay vigilant and keep your guard up, or risk being consumed by the horrors of ZSGO… Can you survive our experience? Craft your story today!

name: BossHunter VR
description: BossHunter VR is the first version of the game where players will have to fight many interesting opponents, use multiple weapons, and a unique mechanic of its kind where the player directly commands a weapon to execute something with the help of speech. The hunt is on!

name: Citizen Conflict
description: Citizen Conflict is a free-to-play hero shooter designed to merge the best of both worlds - to deliver the competitive heat symptomatic of the esports game modes as well as the Battle Royale frenzy to the masses. The game doesn’t fall short on an immersive storyline, which finds three antagonistic syndicates and captivating heroes waging an endless war for dominance. To scale its futuristic dystopian design to the top, Citizen Conflict will brim over with tons of futuristic maps, guns, and uncanny equipment. Citizen Conflict is now available on Epic Store.

name: Beach Invasion 1945: Pacific
description: Beach Invasion 1945: Pacific is a WWII FPS game where you defend the fortified Pacific island beaches against invading forces who will attack you with troops, tanks, planes and more! Use the iconic Japanese and American WWII weaponry, and prepare your defenses with mines, explosives and bonuses!

name: Dungeon Mage
description: Dungeon-Crawler with crafting, combat and exploration. Defeat enemies, collect resources, craft or find equipment and explore the dungeon in order to get stronger. Do to not give in when the celestials come for you ...

name: Dolls
description: Dolls is a first-person horror game in which the player must escape from a dark school inhabited by seemingly lifeless dolls. Confront your fears, unravel the mysteries, and survive this suffocating environment in order to return to reality.

name: Kitty Survivors: Rogues of Catmere
description: Kitty Survivors is a funny action rogue-lite game where you slay hordes of creatures, create overpowered builds, use elemental skills and craft stupid weapons. Join a growing guild of misfits with a thirst for milk, hired to protect the Kingdom of Catmere!

name: Flight Level
description: Flight Level is an Air Traffic Control simulator made by real radar controllers to give everyone a chance to experience what the job is like. The game also teaches the core concepts of ATC and lets players work together in multiplayer.

name: Rallyallyally
description: Rallyallyally is a multiplayer, last-man-standing racing game. Each round one player makes a new track that the others must follow. Slow players are eliminated until only one remains. It's fun, bold and exciting.

name: Meteoric VR
description: Meteoric VR is a low poly first-person space shooter where your mission is to protect the planet from incoming meteors.

name: Stuffed
description: Stuffed is a procedurally generated first-person shooter, that takes place in the dreams of a little girl. Play as a teddy bear and fight waves of nightmares as you defend your owner. Play solo or join your friends in up to 4 player online co-op.

name: Tales of the Aswang VR
description: Tales of the Aswang is a VR game that explores the myths and the epic creatures of Filipino oral tradition compiled from books written by Maximo Ramos and stories passed on through generations of storytelling and remembrance.

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: A Kristus Story: A Night Market Holiday Tale
description: It's the most wonderful time of the year and Yule is in full swing within the Night Market. Join your choice of characters during the festive season and unlock the secrets of Kristus within Artisan Alley. Will you show compassion? Will you understand the motives behind the season? Or will you kill a snowman? It's all up to you in this 87k interactive short.

name: Rogue Station Defense
description: A replayable rogue-like sci-fi Tower Defense strategy game.

name: Mini Tennis Club
description: Step onto the tennis court as your cute and colorful character and get ready to showcase your tennis skills in exciting matches.

name: Eunae Liaro in: Fowl Play
description: You are a scholar, bard, and lover of a good mystery. What you are not is a detective. But when your detective friend is murdered while working on a case of his own, it's up to you to pick up where he left off.

name: Trickle Greenweed
description: Help Trickle Greenweed, newly qualified mermaid attorney, save Christmas! Seanta has been accused of murdering CHRISTMAS ITSELF, and only Trickle, and her new friend Sparky the mer-elf, can prove Seanta's innocence and save the most magical time of the year!

name: Hillslide
description: A snowboarding game where you ride down a procedurally generated slope, racing to outpace an ever-encroaching avalanche. Perform tricks and combos to earn points, and complete tasks to unlock upgrades that increases your odds of survival.

name: Platformer Geometry Dash
description: Geometry Dash 2.2 released a brand new way to play Geometry Dash, platformer mode. Platformer Mode now allows players to move at their own pace navigating tough corridors and fighting different bosses.

name: Red City
description: Sin descripción

name: The Scrolling Enigma
description: Solve riddles, decipher cryptic messages, and piece together the fragments of an elusive truth. A one-hour unique escape game experience.

name: Memory Visiting
description:
Visiting the last memories of you and me.
You were always in my memory.

A short BL visual novel.

name: Supreme Ruler 2030: Expansion Pass
description: The Supreme Ruler 2030 Expansion Pass includes all DLCs remastered for the updated game engine.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Achtung Spitfire! Campaign
description: The Achtung Spitfire! campaign story is inspired by historical events, while its 20 missions have fictional circumstances and use randomization to increase replayability.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Flying Circus - Volume III
description: Flying Circus: Volume III expands the WWI aerial lineup to the early war period, when the war in the skies was even more novel and precarious and the flying machine designs were sometimes built with audacity and blind luck rather than engineering thought.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: CG-4A Collector Plane
description: Military gliders, as a mass phenomenon, belong almost entirely to the World War II era.

name: Don't Starve Together: Starter Pack 2024
description: This Chest contains the playable character, Wurt: The Half-Pint, Wilson's Verdant skin set, Willow's Swashbuckler skin set, Wolfgang's Gladiator skin set, WX-78's Moonbound skin set, the Pastoral Chest, the Narwalrus Chester, and the Yawny Jammies Ensemble.

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 3 - Decayed Hope: Cosmetic Collection
description: Meet Your Maker's Sector 3 Cosmetic Collection is inspired by the battle of Fort Hope and the heroes who fought and died within the Bastion's bunker.

name: MX vs ATV: Legends - Compound Pack
description: Gear up for KTM RD Field & GOAT Farm! The original KTM proving ground offers two Supercross tracks and an all new Enduro experience. The Ricky Carmichael GOAT Farm is also included with three tracks plus a vastly enhanced freeride area. Ready, set, go!

name: MX vs ATV Legends: Husqvarna Pack 2023
description: Start your engines! Purchase the Husqvarna Pack and experience real off-road riding!

name: DCS: P-51D Debden Eagles Campaign by Reflected Simulations
description: Some of the first American airmen to join the air war over Europe were the volunteers of the RAF's Eagle Squadrons. In 1942 they were transferred to the Mighty Eighth Air Force under the 4th Fighter Group, based in Debden, Essex.

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Skin Pack 4
description: Skin Pack 4 includes the following skins: Ai-Mo To-Lï, Quetzali Iqaruz & Yădakk Ürkaz

name: Edge of Soul: Ragnarok
description: Echo of Soul is a free-to-play Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game with a fast-paced action combat, various character customizations and no subscription fee required. Travel the vast open world, compete in PvP modes, and explore EoS.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: NR Class Locomotive - JBR Indian Pacific Pack
description: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, used on both freight and long distance passenger trains. This pack covers the various Indian Pacific liveries seen from 2005 till the present day.

name: Water Flow
description:
Water Flow is an old-school puzzle game in the tradition of Pipe and Ant Run.

Connect the pipes so that the water can flow to the target field. If the playing board is left at an edge, the flow continues on the opposite side and all used fields are renewed. But be aware: the new field can also be a blocked field!

name: Legion of Valkyrie
description: "Legion of Valkyrie" takes you through the mysterious world hundreds of years ago, challenge your destiny, and become a brave adventurer. Form a diverse team of partners, engage in strategic card battles, and unlock the mysteries of the mysterious world.

name: American Truck Simulator: Kenworth T680 2022
description: The moment we've all been eagerly waiting for is finally here! We're thrilled to announce the release of the much-anticipated Kenworth T680 100 Years Anniversary Edition for American Truck Simulator.

name: Tails of Iron: Crimson Knight
description: Includes Exclusive Crimson Knight Set.

name: Buzz Lightyear of Star Command
description: A PS4/PS´5 port of a 2000 action platform game based on the Toy Story franchise which originally was released on PC, PS1, Game Boy Color and Dreamcast.

name: Thrillville: Off the Rails
description:
Experience Thrillville: Off the Rails originally released on the PSP (PlayStationPortable) system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Thrillville: Off the Rails lives up to its name with 20 death-defying rides so outrageous, they inspire the same word from every park visitor who sees them: “WHOA!” Players build these incredible “WHOA Coasters” to leap from one track to another, launch through the air like cannonballs, blast through a burning ring of fire and more.
But the new fun doesn’t stop there. Off the Rails features 34 playable minigames, 15 all-new theme areas, over 40 thrill rides, a new story that ties together more than 100 missions, and social interaction with park guests that’s better than ever. The in-depth conversations both advance the plot and suggest better ways to manage the park. But is every guest to be trusted? and rides.and rides.

• Experience the visceral fun of interacting with a theme park you create.
Build and ride your own creations, talk and joke with all your guests, and play dozens of minigames
• Visit 15 themed areas, like Battleville, Winterville, Spaceville and Aeroville, all spread throughout five new parks
• Create 20 death-defying WHOA Coasters such as:
Hotrod Stunt - A nitro boost propels a car across a broken track
Pendulizer - A giant arm grabs the car just before a gap in the track, whips it around in a full circle, then sets it down on the other side
Escape Drop - The track holds the car stationary as it lifts itself from level ground to a full 90-degree drop. Then it lets go
• Distinguish your rides even more with enhanced customization options • Attach animatronics, flowers and flaming hoops to all of your coasters and rides
• Play 34 minigames – 14 new, 20 returning from the original Thrillville but with new levels

name: Thrillville
description:
Experience Thrillville originally released on the PSP (PlayStationPortable) system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Thrillville allows gamers of all ages to easily build and customize the coaster of your dreams. Gone are the days of the complex PC techniques used in other coaster games. Rather, Thrillville's easy to use building mode has been designed specifically for the console platforms and makes building all 75-plus rides from wooden, corkscrew and inverted coasters to merry go rounds, trains and carnival rides, easy, and most importantly, fun. Imagination is the only height limit with Thrillville, where the fun ranges from racing on go-kart tracks you put together and playing mini-golf on courses you designed to dozens of party games, from bumper cars to arcade shoot-'em-ups. You can also tour the park on foot - a first for theme-park titles - chatting and joking with all the guests to help them out and make sure they're enjoying themselves.

• Build, manage, ride, customize and socialize your way through the five theme parks you've created
• The simplest, most intuitive development tools available for all 75-plus ride types, from wooden, corkscrew and inverted coasters to merry-go-rounds, trains and all your favorite carnival rides
• Play classic midway games like bumper cars, saucer soccer, remote-control cars, shooting gallery, mini-golf, rhythm challenges, arcade-style shoot- em-ups and puzzlers
• Interact and develop a relationship with any guests you see - Listen to and address their unique concerns about your park, joke with them, and even help a guest impress his crush by winning that special prize
• Explore 15 different themed areas spread across five theme parks, such as Pirates Gone Wild, Gold Rush, Ancient Treasures of Egypt and Moon Base

name: Truck Simulator Driver USA 2024
description: Truck Simulator Driver USA is an exciting video game that lets you experience the thrill of driving a truck in America.

name: R Wheel
description: R Wheel is a fast-pased one-button game. Try to survive inside a spinning wheel with spikes. Press a button to jump and hold a button to stay in the air longer. But your jumps release a wave that spawns the spikes. Collect bonus items to release a wave that clears the spikes and score points by clearing them. The game is over when you hit the spikes.

name: Tails of Iron: Bright Fir Forest
description: Set after the climactic events of the base campaign, ‘Bright Fir Forest’, a new free end-game expansion, sees our noble Rat King Redgi invited by the Squirrels to celebrate the Festival of Leaf Fall… However, a new foul and revenge-seeking adversary stands to ruin the celebrations.

name: The Anomaly 3: Tower
description: Latest in digs' Anomaly series featuring trademark mind tricks, map hacks and surprises. Dressed in a medieval/wizard theme with many textures and visual flourishes taken from Arcane Dimensions, for which the map was created.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Sobu Line Rapid Service - Tokyo to Narita Airport Terminal 1: E217 series
description: The Sobu Rapid Line is a 79.2 km long line running east-west between Tokyo Sta. in Tokyo's Chiyoda Ward and Chiba Sta. in Chiba City, Chiba Prefecture.The Sobu Line (Rapid) DLC can operate the section of the Narita Line from Sakura Station to Narita Airport Terminal 1 Station via Narita Station.

name: Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord - Heroes Assemble
description: 'Heroes Assemble' expansion pack introduces 24 new generals and exclusive sets, allowing players to choose and experience the charm of unique generals at the beginning of the game.

name: Christmas Adventure
description: Welcome to the Christmas adventure. In this game you have to guess the girls' outfit for Christmas celebration. If you get it right, you are in for a naughty Christmas night.

name: Danger Zone Bomber
description: Danger Zone Bomber is a survival defense roguelike game where you have to defeat waves of zombies and protect your base. Drop bombs from the plane to kill zombies and protect your base.

name: Where Sacabamba Aspises
description: Find 100 Sacabamba Aspises. A carefully hand drawn 4K scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Where Pandas
description: Search for 100 pandas. A carefully hand drawn 4K scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Suika game 3D
description: What is better than a 2D watermelon? A 3D one! The evolution of the watermelon game with a new level of depth! Suika game 3D.

name: Mosaic Mysteries
description: Assemble the broken shards of intricate stained glass mosaics. Use the illuminated watch glass and shuffle through dozens of pieces. Reveal fantastical landscapes, fairytale castles and art-nouveau murals.

name: Purrfect Rescue
description: Purrfect Rescue is a hidden object game where you must find and rescue all the alley kittens in the city, placing them up for adoption.

name: Search All: Snails
description: is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the snails in a large location. The snails will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Phantasie Memorial Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Mining Mechs: Magnetic Mystery
description: Explore a brand new map and storyline set in the Arctic! Magnetic waves have been detected underground and you know what that means: you need to dig down and find out what's going on. Will you unravel this magnetic mystery?

name: Luminaria: Dark Echoes
description:
Welcome to Luminaria Dark Echoes, the thrilling roguelike action role-playing game that fuses the intensity of Vampire Survivors with the strategic depth of Dark Souls!

In an alternate universe where the Industrial Revolution took a bleak turn and light became a scarce treasure, a world war has left humanity on the brink of extinction. However, among the ruins, a few brave survivors resist. Now, a dark entity emerges, corrupting souls and plunging the world into deep darkness.

name: Phantom Vortex VR
description: Phantom Vortex VR is a hectic bullet hell filled with mayhem. Navigate the corridors of crafted levels and step into the other side of an ethereal world. Becoming a jiving phantom yourself.

name: Short Sad Stories
description: Alice is a dreamy girl who lives between the real and imaginary worlds, in love with the wrong person. Just before that situation becomes unsustainable, things change unexpectedly, and a new path opens for her and those around her.

name: Bible Trivia
description: Embark on an enlightening journey through the Bible with our True or False Quiz Game. Immerse yourself in the world of biblical stories, characters, and events as you put your knowledge to the test.

name: Supreme Ruler The Great War Remastered
description: Real-Time Strategy/Wargame. BattleGoat Studios invites you to travel back to 1914 and select from more than 50 playable regions at the onset of World War I, as European powers struggle to survive and new technologies transform warfare.

name: Supreme Ruler The Great War Remastered DLC
description: Real-Time Strategy/Wargame. BattleGoat Studios invites you to travel back to 1914 and select from more than 50 playable regions at the onset of World War I, as European powers struggle to survive and new technologies transform warfare.

name: Fire Guardian
description: A platform adventure game. Explore various scenarios, lute against mercenaries, drones. Feed the animals.

name: Chutney: Space Survivor
description: Chutney: Space Survivor is a third person, hoard-shooting deck builder where you play as Chutney, shooting down hordes of enemies with his Omni-gun. Alter your attacks by collecting different cartridges and create unique synergies!

name: Detective Dave
description: A washed-up Detective demoted to graveyard shift has gone rogue and stops going by the book. You play the part of Detective Dave as he explores the dark side of the city. Solve cases, work undercover, or hand out justice the old fashion way.

name: United Penguin Kingdom: Huddle up
description: This free version of the United Penguin Kingdom covers the content from one-year in-game time. A city-building game where you build a penguin settlement and satisfy the various needs of your penguins while dealing with seals and killer whales.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Tales of Centauron
description: Explore the 24th-century Centauron sector in Galactic Civilizations IV's DLC, "Tales of Centauron." Discover unique tech, planetary upgrades, and ship parts. Enjoy new events and expanded gameplay for custom civilizations, enhancing both strategy and story in a dynamic universe.

name: You Got Crabs
description: Watch your crabs live their lives and force evolutionary changes by altering the environment in this calm, relaxing life simulator

name: Chasing Chickens
description: CHASING CHICKENS is where Quake's adrenaline meets Pac-Man's wit. Dive into 3D chaos with old-school charm: exploding beachballs, an army of killer chickens, floating cows, all in a hedge maze. Armed with a high-powered grenade launcher, it's a wild race. Outsmart, outrun, outplay. Ready, soldier?

name: House of Jigsaw: Amazing Colors of the World
description: Unleash your inner puzzle maestro and dive into the multicolored landscapes of House of Jigsaw: Colors of the World DLC.

name: Nightwatch
description: Nightwatch is a first person mystery game that plays out in the woods of Rivertidecreek. A walking simulator that features choices of dialogues and different puzzles. The artwork will make you feel absorbed in the game.

name: Conquest of Empires 2
description: My Liege, welcome to Conquest of Empires 2, an epic war strategy game! Explore our encyclopedia of Ancient Civilizations. Launch your first session and experience the rise and fall of history.

name: Tank Mayhem
description: Tank Mayhem is an intense local multiplayer tank shooter with many unique power-ups and game modes. With a 3D environment and real-time lighting, this game aims to add a modern twist to classic 2D tank shooters. Have fun blasting your friends and trying out all of the exciting weapons.

name: Up N' Down
description: Up N' Down is a multiplayer racing game where you have to use items to your advantage. Race to the top, grab the crown and find a safe way down to the finish line.

name: Match Gem 99
description: MatchGem 99 is a unique large-scale 3-match puzzle battle royale game where 99 players compete in real-time. Master the use of special blocks and gauge attacks to outlast your opponents and be the last one standing!

name: Shakunetsu no Miko Shizune
description: Shizune Ayatsuji was born in a prestigious priestess family and raised to become an Exorcist. One day, she confronted a powerful Fiend. Shizune did not stand a chance, but her mother Kaori, also a powerful priestess, came to rescue her. Shizune made a resolve to defeat that monster at all costs.

name: Treasure Hunter: History of Monastery Gold
description: Treasure Hunter is a Metal Detecting Simulator, with lots of humorous quests and exciting storyline based on true event. With 250 thousand findings on the map and big open world.

name: Hot Babes
description: In this 2D puzzle you have the responsibility to arrange your hot friends in a way that they fit in space. Hot Babes comes with 80 handcrafted levels and a variety of babes of all shapes and sizes.

name: Wild River Run
description: Twitch integrated game that involves racing in rivers.

name: Cygnus Enterprises
description:
Cygnus Enterprises combines action RPG and base management elements and is set on the alien frontier world of Mytilus.
Currently in Early Access, Cygnus Enterprises offers approximately 12 hours of content which will be expanded upon further in future updates.

name: Sinister Entity
description: Third-Person horror game . The game contains many puzzles and mysteries. The game contain escaping and hiding from evil entity.

name: Just King
description: Just King is an action auto-battler with roguelike elements. Assemble your party to venture into different lands fighting fearsome kings and their deadly armies. Use your loot to hire and upgrade mighty heroes... or the bard.

name: Rising Sun
description: 2D roguelite action. Exhilarating action with easy controls. Grab the relics and use your skills to conquer the tower as many times as you can. Even the toughest bosses will be easy depending on your luck!

name: Love Tavern
description: After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different girls from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.

name: Wargame Construction Set II: Tanks!
description: Welcome to TANK HEAVEN! SSI's classic tactical warfare lets you command tanks from 1918 to 1991. Craft unique battles with the random scenario generator or take control with the custom editor. Endless possibilities await in this armored clash of eras - create or conquer!

name: Dwelvers
description:
Dwelvers is a real time strategy game where The player takes the role of an evil Dungeon Lord who guide its minions through building their own dungeon, below and above the surface. Manage elaborate production chains, cater to the needs and quirks of each monster and lead them to battles against other monsters and pathetic humans.

The most challenging part for the player will be creating an advanced production system so as to have enough food to keep the creatures well fed, enough weapons and armour to outfit their army as a force to be reckoned with, and of course enough beer to keep them satisfied with you as their master. A drunk minion is a happy minion! The theme of the game will have a lot of dark humour, and each creature will have its own personality, demands and fighting style; forcing the player to handle all the creatures in different ways in order to max out their potential. A happy minion is a useful minion.

name: 100 Hidden Cats in America
description: Can you find all 100 Hidden Cats in America?

name: A Pinky Problem
description:
Skye has lots of friends! That's because she's the coolest girl you've ever met: stylish, and kind, and talented, and bad at keeping her mouth shut when she needs to.

You said you'd keep her secret safe, but she hasn't been making it easy. As the years flew by, her secret grew bigger, until you found yourself snarled in a web of lies and questionable choices.

With your biggest hurdle looming over the horizon, you've got a stressful three days ahead of you.

How far will you go to fulfil your promise?

name: SM64 Coop Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?: Trivia Bundle
description: The Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Trivia Bundle gives you access to brand new Content Packs, featuring over 2,000 new questions on a variety of interesting topics.!

name: Vincent's Chocolate
description: Emily travels to the family home to attend a birthday party. However, an unexpected event will trigger a series of events that will make him question whether his family is hiding any secrets.

name: Bus Stop
description: A pocket-sized intro to a whodunnit involving you, your phone, and the people at the bus stop you sleep at.

name: Detective Lin: Time Murder Frenzy
description: A narrative click and point game where you gather information from the past to solve the murder of your best friend.

name: White Island
description: Welcome to Kvitøya Research Station. It's going to be chilly, so make sure to bring some extra socks! You have been invited to share your project as part of their research scholarship program. Everything is going to be perfect, until you get there and it's not.

name: Enter Passcode
description:
I've forgotten my 4 digit passcode!

Fortunately, I saved some hints on my phone. All the hints have a yes/no answer. I remember that if you know all the answers then you can determine the passcode, and that there are no redundant questions.

name: Enlisted: M3A1 Squad
description:
This pack includes:

- A squad consisting of 6 crew members of level 4, including a premium APC driver
- A premium M3A1 armored personnel carrier
- 200 gold

name: Night Raid
description: Sin descripción

name: Crab Boat
description: Sin descripción

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NR Class Locomotive - JBR Indian Pacific Pack
description: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, used on both freight and long distance passenger trains. This pack covers the various Indian Pacific liveries seen from 2005 till the present day.

name: Trainz Plus: NR Class Locomotive - JBR Indian Pacific Pack
description: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, used on both freight and long distance passenger trains. This pack covers the various Indian Pacific liveries seen from 2005 till the present day.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Oshiribeat Pack
description: Meet the collaboration pack between 「Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL」 and multi genres creator group 'Oshiribeat'! This DLC includes a total of 7 new songs.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Ultimate Sprite Pack
description: Upgrade the appearance of Europa Universalis IV with the Ultimate Sprite Pack.This pack includes 28 separate packs to add greater cultural and historical fidelity to the appearance of military sprites, as well as other attractive visual content on the map.

name: Hitman World of Assassination: Part One
description: Step into the shoes of Agent 47 and explore the six iconic locations from HITMAN (2016) in Part One of HITMAN World of Assassination.

name: Retro Collection 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Pendulo Studios Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: T.V Favorites Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Quake + Quake II Enhanced Bundle
description: Play the authentic, updated and visually enhanced versions of Quake and Quake II, and experience the ground-breaking first-person shooters that inspire today's retro-style FPS games.

name: Airport
description: As a kid, have you ever dreamed of being an air traffic controller, managing the flights of hundreds of toy planes and passengers? Well, now you can with Airport, the new traffic management game for Nintendo Switch!

name: Warframe: Cumulus Collection
description: Amplify your Arsenal's flair with the extravagant Cumulus Collection. Become the envy of your enemies and fellow Tenno alike with the stunning Cirrus Armor Bundle, Cumulus Syandana, Stratus Pistol Skin and more!

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: US Movies 90s
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: US Movies 90s

name: Anime RPG: Isekai Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Grimoire Organizer
description:
Grimoire Organizer is a game about flicking books into the bookshelves.

The books come in 3 colors - red, green and blue, with 3 cover designs for each of the colors. Take books from the stack, aim and launch them into the bookcase where they belong! If you mismatch the color of the book in hand with the place in the bookcase, or try to place it where there is already a book, you lose 1 try. You start with 5 tries and the goal is to keep at least 1 try under the timer.

Try a different configurable time - either 52 or 200 seconds!

Good luck!

name: Spatial Savior Biganger
description: CAN YOU EVEN ESCAPE? Battle against the endless horde of robots in the inescapable world inside the black hole! The clock is ticking!

name: The Monty Mole Collection
description: The saga of a British computer game icon

name: Classic Games Puzzle Collection
description: Indulge in nostalgia with the Classic Games Puzzle Collection, featuring a selection of beloved video game classics that are sure to evoke fond memories.

name: Tennis 2024 Simulator
description: Are you ready to conquer the Grand Slam titles and become a tennis legend?

name: Vampire Survivors: Emergency Meeting
description:
The Survivors are desperate to hunt vampires, but are running out of places to look. Only one option remains: Be the bullet hell... in space!

Gather your most trusted Crewmates, prepare to eject the Impostors, and try to survive while mowing down thousands of extra-terrestrial foes in this expansion for Vampire Survivors. Turn classic Among Us tasks into outrageous weapons, upgrading your abilities after every roguelite run to overcome impossible odds with ease. Be alert to subterfuge as you explore the vast weirdness of the Polus Replica and keep your wits about you, as suspicious eyes are always watching.

name: Sticky Business: Plan With Me
description: Plan With Me not only brings you a delightful array of cozy stickers for your shop but also infuses them with a unique theme.

name: Aegis Dilemma: Veritas Omnia Vincit
description: Several centuries have passed since the Blight Era ended. All the suffering of the time seems to be over. Enter the journey of Jules, a normal mercenary thrust into unusual circumstances. Follow her journey to find the truth about herself and her close friends….

name: Quiet is the Eyes
description: All your coworkers are gone and the halls are quiet, except for the pitter patter of rain on the window. Explore a desolate laboratory as a creature stalks you, always watching. Run and hide as you solve puzzles and learn more about what happened to the facility its secrets.

name: Cover Yourself in Blood
description:
1. Wait for it to Blood.

2. Cover Yourself in Blood.

name: Fetus in Oil Painting
description: This is a game that allows players to freely explore and appreciate the scenery in the museum.

name: Koibumi
description: Koibumi It is a letter confessing love. It is a so-called love letter. The content is sweet and sour, full of dreams and hopes. One letter can determine happiness or despair. It is such a fine line. This is an action game in which you become such a love letter and deliver love.

name: Kingdom of Bärn
description: Kingdom of Bärn: Dive into the enchanting world of Kingdom of Bärn, a mesmerizing RPG experience that combines the charm of low-poly graphics with an expansive open world filled with quests, crafting, and epic battles. Immerse yourself in a captivating story, conquer challenging quests.

name: Hidden Cats in Santa's Realm
description: It's Christmas time! The Icy Santa's Realm is in full steam!! Join in the fun and search for all the Hidden Cats one by one among the elves to reveal the final colored art. With over 970 hidden objects to find, this time we are giving you an EXTRA BONUS SNOWBALL GAME at the park!

name: Magic Labyrinth 3D
description: Procedural generated Labyrinth from 10x10 to 50x50 cells with monsters chests and traps. Skills development. Inventory and craft. Mechanism of character hunger/satiety. Collecting very rare Trophies. Easy mode without death. Pets that may be tamed and will help you in the Labyrinth.

name: Paper Hero Manager
description: This is game for streamers with Twitch integration, its "Graphic support for a read adventure"

name: Strike Back
description: With a completely new and simple hide and shoot gameplay, it will help players have a good Action experience without having to get tired from moving too much. Players will go through 16 campaigns in 16 different locations to confront enemies, bosses and zombies.

name: Where Rabbits
description: Find 100 Rabbits. A carefully hand drawn 4K scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Just Because of Beauty
description: Game background: The story of Brother Chicken and Ms. Chao on the day of 520. Suitable for the crowd: The game contains some nudity and is not recommended for underage players. Game status: Continuously updating. This story is purely fictitious and any similarity is purely coincidental.

name: Girls Hobby in Love
description: Six girls have a hobby group. One likes to listen to music, another likes to draw, and the third likes to read. Each girl is special in her interests. Which one will you like more?

name: Gaia's Blessing
description: Gaia's Blessing is a casual deck building farming simulator with hundred of cards for you to discover and use. Plan, Plant, and Profit as you build up your personal card collection. Help develop the so-called card tech and discover the truth behind it all!

name: Scary Mine VR
description: "Scary Mine" is an immersive virtual reality horror game that plunges players into the eerie confines of an abandoned mine. With realistic graphics, spine-chilling sound effects, and split-second decision-making, players will unravel the unknown horrors lurking in the darkness.

name: VFurrika!
description:
VFurrika! is an addictive puzzle game that combines the charm of your favourite VFur streamers with strategic gameplay.
Drop your favorite furry VTuber into a glass and witness them merging into other VTubers upon contact!

name: Lost in Space
description: A sci-fi turn-based card strategy game in which you must guide your team of astronauts through horror, food shortages while maintaining their sanity, and uncover the mystery of the mission.

name: Card Fuse
description: A deck building roguelike where you will combine your cards with new ones you find, obliterating enemies with the cards that you make and becoming more powerful with each card you fuse.

name: Hide or Sex
description: “Hide or Sex” In our new game, you must be ready to survive the love that your adventure companions want to give you. With awesome 2D animation, this is a must play!

name: Christmas Clash
description: Help Santa claus and his christmas elfs to stop the angry babies, toddlers, and kids. Use strategy and management to secure the road to the workshop.

name: Fairies Love
description: This is an elimination game with beautiful painting style, go through the level and meet six girls with different personalities, in the face of their challenges you should make choices to make them succeed as your girlfriend.

name: Delta MMORPG
description: Online MMO RPG filled with adventure & action. Slash enemies or use magic to conquer. Embark on quests, delve into stories, encounter dragons, orcs, elves & more. Choose your class: Warrior (Guardian/Knight), Archer (Hunter/Ranger), Mage (Wizard/Archmage), or Priest (Druid/Cleric).

name: Staff Runner
description: Unleash your inner musical maestro with Staff Runner, the captivating educational game that transforms sheet music learning into an exciting adventure. Say goodbye to dull lessons and hello to a fun, interactive way to read sheet music.

name: Only Up 2
description: Reach new heights in "Only Up 2," set in a mysterious world above the clouds, brimming with secrets waiting to be unearthed. Embark on an ascent like no other, the only limit is the sky.

name: Suika Combination
description:
Can you combine them up to Suika?
Inspired by Suika Game

name: DNF Duel: DLC 3 - Battle Mage
description: 'Battle Mage' can be used in DNF Duel.

name: Animal Trail Girlish Square 2
description: Idol fan and manager, Nakamori Taiga and the girls are back in this latest installment! Animal Trail ☆ Girlish Square is gaining momentum and have a chance to reach stardom in the upcoming Tokyo New Idol Festival. The stage is set: it’s time to kick things off with another roar!

name: Total Vengeance
description: Fueling the desire for vengeance, players must survive against ghastly creatures, uncover the truth behind the gas station's abandonment, and confront their own inner demons. The choices made throughout the journey will shape their destiny, blurring the lines between redemption and revenge.

name: Goliath Depot
description: Goliath Depot is a door-slamming 2D arcade platformer taken straight from the early 80's. Close all doors, kick the enemies and rack up a high score in 4 different worlds. Are you good enough to lift the curse of the Goliath Depot?

name: ModelMaker
description: ModelMaker gives you the freedom to create assembly models with the editor, without any restrictions or presets. You can design unique assembly models to show your imagination and creativity.

name: Missing Kitty
description: Embark on a tranquil journey of discovery and reunion as you immerse yourself in this quest to find your beloved Missing Kitty. Unveil the secrets of enchanting environments as you seek out the Kitty's toys and her endearing companions hidden amidst the picturesque landscapes.

name: Another Chance
description: Another Chance is an isometric, story driven experience which pits you in the midst of an alien apocalypse. Split apart by your wife, your only objective is reuniting with her...or is it?

name: Wild Thaw
description: Wild Thaw is a third-person platformer about a fireball facing down a mountain of ice.

name: Medieval Idle: Quest
description: Medieval Idle: Quest is a captivating game that will transport you back to the middle ages. This idle game combines the elements of simulation and strategy to create a truly engaging experience for gamers of all ages.

name: Entogious
description: Kill an angel in a real-time-turn-based combat style thats COMPLETELY UNFAIR and take it’s heart. Die 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 times who cares? Become the richest man alive. Hmmmm COWS?!?!!.

name: Pirates of Heaven
description: Pilot flying boats and swing from island to island using your grappling hook in epic 100-player battles in the sky.

name: Zeeverse
description: Zeeverse is a creator platform built on top of a blockchain-based game centered around a vast collection of unique little creatures called ZEE NFTs. Collect and battle more than 250+ different ZEE kinds with unlimited variations. Each unique, each only yours. In Zeeverse you explore various dungeons, hunt for treasures, battle epic bosses with friends, battle other players, build and farm on your lands, discover treasures, and travel Zeeverse to discover epic adventures.

name: The Enjenir
description: In this light hearted physics based building game, you are a clumsy medieval engineer. The game combines gridless sandbox building with hilarious physics driven third person controls. With infinite structural design possibilities - the only limit is your imagination… oh, and gravity!

name: Project Bridge
description: Project Bridge is a fun co-op endless runner that can be played in couch mode or multiplayer adventure with up to 4 people. Gather resources, build bridges over procedurally generated terrains, upgrade your character's skillset and run as far as you can before the mysterious void swallows you!

name: No More Snow
description: Battle your way through Christmas monsters in this laid-back co-op shooter. Equip a variety of firearms and melee weapons, face hordes of enemies and bosses in each level, and take down the evil Krampus.

name: Zerone
description: Zerone is a PC-based high-quality VR game, and it is a Hyper FPS game that competes with the enemy units of the mechanic series.

name: Reficul 666
description: As darkness descends upon the world. all contact is lost. Set in a small town in North America, will you survive the dark new world? Prepare for a challenging and unique enemy, powerful magical relics, and an unsettling atmosphere in this creepy Post-apocalyptic Indie survival horror game.

name: Frozen Inferno
description: Nana has come to face her sins, but it seems things would not go her way... Frozen Inferno is an Ice Climber fan-game that takes horror elements and mix them with platforming gameplay to give you a short but fun experience.

name: Spiral Clicker: Christmas Survivors
description:
Helen, your servant and partner-in-crime has a special surprise for you this Christmas; a trip to the North Pole realm where you can add Sandy to your harem. There is just one small problem; someone else already beat you to her!

With the North Pole swarming with mindless elves, imps, and succubi, the only chance you have of adding Sandy to your harem will be to survive their attempts to break your will and stop the source of Sandy's corruption... So you can corrupt her yourself.

6 characters from Spiral Clicker make an appearance in the game, and each specializes in one of the 6 spells in the game to change how that spell works for them.

Each character has a 5 part story line that plays out between stages, each concluding with a new full screen CG.

name: Running Knight
description: Sin descripción

name: Detective Diaries
description:
"Detective Diaries" immerses you in a riveting murder-solving adventure. Assume the role of Elena Volkov, determined to uncover the truth behind her father's chilling murder in an isolated Arctic research center.

Explore the frozen corridors, interrogate suspects, and solve puzzles to unravel the complex web of relationships, deceit, and hidden motives. The clock is ticking, and the Arctic holds more secrets than it lets on. Can you decipher the clues and unveil the dark truths hidden in the ice?

With its gripping narrative and challenging puzzles, "Detective Diaries" promises an unforgettable journey into the heart of mystery. Are you prepared to confront the chilling secrets concealed in the frozen Arctic landscape?

name: Burning Questions
description: Save the burning evidence.

name: Talking in Circles
description: Try and free yourself from the curse that's bound your bloodline for centuries! Piece together clues from ancient tomes and long lost spirits to confront the Demon that has plagued you for so long.

name: Evocation
description: In a small cul-de-sac neighborhood lives a group of 3 middle-school aged friends. Together, they share a treehouse where they hang out after school. All is well, until one day they notice a portrait of themselves hung up on the wall with a fourth person they've never seen before. Who could this mysterious boy be, and how did he show up in their lives? The answer, once known, may never be remembered...

name: Burnt Legacy
description: A detective document game where you sift through papers to try and piece together the case.

name: Cold Shift
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadows in the City
description:
Discover the hidden secrets of NeoCity in "Shadows in the City", the detective novel that immerses you in a world of mystery, conspiracy and futuristic science. He accompanies intrepid detective Alex Mercer as he confronts the shadows that lurk in the alleys of this futuristic metropolis.

Facing corporate conspiracies, political corruption, and banned scientific experiments, Mercer will unravel the truth behind the disappearance of scientist Claire Reynolds. The city, a crucible of technological advances and hidden shadows, becomes the scene of an epic confrontation between light and darkness.

name: Zoltan's Curse
description:
This is a game where it's up to you to decide how much of the story is enough.

You highlight words in dialogue by clicking and dragging, which gets you cards. Then, you use those cards to uncover a part of the story

name: Cyber Sleuth Simulacrum
description: Drinks, punks, capitalism, a Cyberpunk Neo-noir Visual Novel

name: Lost in Immortal Island
description:
Eternal life is a fascinating thing forever.

A long time ago, there were three mysterious islands hidden in the mist-shrouded sea. The ancient Chinese emperor Qin Shi Huang once sent Xu Fu to the east to find these islands, where the supreme secret of eternal life was hidden, but Xu Fu never returned......

What happened in between? Try to find the answer.......

name: The Cold Case
description:
You're one of our best element but were put in here after some ... trouble in your previous investigation.

You have a natural detective mind and are able to visualize the situation from the data noted during the investigation.
