Put your experience to use and you may have the right to get back on the field

name: The Missing Sock
description: Simple, light mystery to figure out some names and what happened to the missing sock by snooping around and talking to other animals.

name: Withering Gardens
description: Follow the aged-up detective in the dystopian future, trying to regain his memories back.

name: The Lonely Logs of Lincoln Lane
description: Pore through blueprints and datalogs to solve a series of murders without leaving your apartment. A game of logical deduction and critical thinking. Not all is as it seems...

name: Angel Killer
description: A non-linear murder mystery set in early 2000's with 22 different endings

name: Frame of Mind
description:
n the early hours of a dewy November day, Contessa Cornelia Foster reports her daughter, a renowned researcher and famous shut-in, missing from their manor. She was rumoured to be on the cusp of a major breakthrough. That morning, a bloodstain was found on the floor of her lab.

She’s not the only one unaccounted for. Her lab assistant and an artist-in-residence are also mysteriously absent.

Your clues are two crucial sources: A diary entry from the lab assistant and a sketch from the artist-in-residence, both dated the previous day. Their accounts are curiously contradictory.

Can you solve the inherent contradictions to crack the case of what truly happened?

name: Jo-Zeas Gravity Adventure
description: Help Jo-Zeas solve puzzles and take back control of her ship. Control gravity to advance through the spaceship's rooms and overcome obstacles.

name: I Love My Goblin Girlfriend
description: I Love My Goblin Girlfriend is a one-player point-and-click adventure game designed to explore the age-old question: what does your girlfriend want to eat? It’s all about the snacks in this three-part mystery to figure out how to satisfy your goblin gal and unlock the smooch of your dreams. After all, a goblin girl’s gotta eat!

name: R.R.S Cape
description:
You wake up confused inside the R.R.S Cape, a research submersible on an expedition to survey a newly discovered archipelago. As you come to your senses, you realise that you are stranded *somewhere* at the bottom of the sea & oxygen is quickly running out...

With limited air, a map & any clues you can gather from inside your soon-to-become coffin, can you deduce your precise location to call for a rescue mission before it is too late?

name: Fowl Play
description: Visit post-WW1 London in a world run by birds, and try to solve your own murder while you're there. Mechanics heavily inspired by Case of The Golden Idol, could be considered a fan-made mod for the game.

name: Case of the Canvas
description: A prototype for a game in which you need to solve mysteries in a mythical museum with magical paintings.

name: Notes on a Mystery
description: This is a short mystery story where you have to pick the right words to answer questions.

name: Quiller's Code
description: Solve ciphers to uncover the identity of the Quiller.

name: Dear Murder Diary
description: Dear Murder Diary is a text-based murder mystery type game, where the player tries to piece together who died and how by reading newspaper articles. Built from a simple gameplay loop where even the finest of detail can bring you closer to the truth.

name: Beneath the Waves
description: A cruise ship makes an early return to Florida, but there is not a single passenger on board. FBI Shelly Clark is tasked with investigating the disappearances. Will she uncover the truth, or become lost like the others?

name: Petty Officer
description: You are a Compliance Officer for SPACEFLEET. Search for clues on your Compliance Console. Open your dossier to assemble your investigation, check your work, and bring Captain Braxton to justice. Click and Drag until the truth is revealed.

name: Mystery of the Sleeping Castle
description: The Mystery of the Sleeping Castle is a narrative detective game in the style of Case of the Golden Idol and Return of the Obra Dinn, but pinker, more fairytale, and EVERYBODY LIVES! (well, mostly) Make your way through the castle, observe clues and make deductions to solve puzzles, identify the residents, and ultimately release the castle from slumber

name: New HR Job
description: You're a new employee at a remote only job. You must find out which handles match which employees in the company chat program.

name: Loftlock
description:
Loftlock is a point-and-click fantasy puzzle game. You are Runi: a young wizard who is eager to set off for their new apprenticeship. Your beloved grandmother has bequeathed a tome to you that will undoubtedly serve you well in the coming days, but there’s a catch – she’s forgotten the combination to its lock!

Thankfully, she’s left some clues in the attic – all you need to do is find them.

name: Ready Set Golf
description:
Play real-time multiplayer golf with your friends and be the ultimate winner!
Tee off with your friends and players from around the world in Ready Set Golf! Race against real players in fast-paced rounds of mini golf and unleash your skills to climb the leaderboard, earn exciting cosmetics, and activate power-ups. With support for up to eight players simultaneously, the competition is fierce and the taste of victory is sweet!

name: We Suspect Foul Play
description:
Hollywood, a land of dreams!

But this dream has turned into a nightmare, with the assassination of famous actress Mary Helen in her villa in the middle of the night.

You are tasked to search the scene, find clues, and reconstruct what has happened!

name: Classified: of 2015
description:
In [CLASSIFIED] of 2015, play as a yearbook editor working at a photography studio, trying to make sense of a bizarre photoshoot at Voyager Academy.

Use context clues and sleuth through the available photos to determine who's who, and solve the mystery of what went down at this middle school.

name: Fragile Ascent
description: Team up with a friend to build the tallest, most precarious tower imaginable.

name: Final Contract
description: A Hired Assassin Goes On His Final Mission...Before Christmas.

name: The Crimson Debt
description: You've lived your whole life in a single basement. Now, your cage is unlocked. You could leave this house at any moment you want. But without knowing what happened, can you ever truly be free?

name: I'm Not a Creep (I Promise)
description: A short visual novel where you make a tea for a cute boy.

name: Opening Night
description: A mystery at the comedy club

name: SCP Foundation Dungeon
description: Adds the SCP foundation as a dungeon that can spawn (by default on Titan, config can be adjusted to spawn on a variety of different moons including custom ones) Includes custom assets in the SCP style, and a fully functional SCP 914 if you can find it.

name: 100 Asian Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Asian Cats.

name: The Captcha Game
description:
Welcome to "The Captcha Game" – Where completing a verification is the game itself.
Don't worry, it'll only take a few seconds.
So... Are you a Human?

name: The Slime Sanctuary
description: A medium sized metal-themed map for Copper

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 2
description: An erotic Visual Novel featuring HD graphics and realistic-looking characters. Episode 2 reconnects him with Grayson - the charming guy who approached him at a party last year. Tony goes to Gray's workplace to gauge his interest, ultimately spending a wild night together in the Spa.

name: Battle of Fate
description: Battle of Fate is a first-person PvE shooter in which players fend off waves of enemies in a variety of environments created by randomly selecting maps, weapons, monsters, and items.

name: Counter Attack
description: Counter Attack is a defense-based first-person shooter where you progress through story-driven missions and fend off incoming enemies.

name: Gun Fighting
description: Gunfighting is a first-person shooter game with a 1v1 simulated combat training concept that takes into account confined environments, such as inside a building, to confront the enemy.

name: Dice Battle
description: Dice Battle is a casual game in which you could act as a rolling dice jumping over your enermy and flatten them in Level or endless mode. Fully control your dice to avoid the barrage and beat the enemy dice.

name: Neon Geometry Dash
description: Rhythm-based action game with challenging levels and awesome music.

name: Christmas Puzzle 4
description: Blast through match-3 puzzles and restore beautiful town in Winterland. Build a cozy little cottage on the hill and a cookie factory, fire up the oven and get baking! Welcome visitors to your town and complete dozens of quests. Winter has tons of fun in stock.

name: Last Caveman
description: What do parachutes, augers and bazookas have in common? They help the "Cavemen", a troop of irresistible fellows with loincloths and three-day beards, to complete their search for a cozy home with as little loss as possible.

name: Milf Dream
description: Do you want to hook up the hottest moms? We got you covered, mild lovers!

name: Heart-S-Truck
description: Navigate a world on the brink in "Heart-S-Truck," a challenging physics-driven platformer where you steer heroic delivery trucks on a mission to save humanity!

name: The Game Of Death
description: Step into the bony shoes of Death in this unique platform game. As the iconic skeleton character, you're one day away from retirement when a sinister thief steals your life savings. Reclaim what's yours and set off on your dream vacation.

name: Null Gravity Labyrinth
description:
Find the golden cube to exit this abstract labyrinth.
When touching a spinning cube all elements with the same color will disappear and new paths will form.
When you touch a portal it will teleport you to another portal of the same color.

name: 100 Asian Cats
description: 100 Asian Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Asia! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Asian temples as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: Nudel Tag
description: In Nudel Tag, challenge your friends to get the most tips, in a crazy ramen restaurant ! Find up to 4 controllers, to have the most fun, and see who is the best waiter in the house !

name: Sanguo's Ambition 4: Three Kingdoms
description: The world's first competitive SLG strategy game with real-time matchmaking for multiplayer battles. In 《Three Kingdoms Ambition 4》 you can experience the unique journey of starting as a small faction and growing into a powerful warlord during the turbulent Three Kingdoms era.

name: Boxing Simulator
description: Boxing Simulator is a 3D, Strategy, Simulator, Action, Fighter, Fist Fight, Boxing game.

name: Within The Depths
description: Explore a mysterious island flooded with dangerous creatures in both Singleplayer and Multiplayer gamemodes!

name: Castle Kingdom Wars
description: Make your own strategy to beat your enemies. Characters have different skills so you can defeat your enemy with different tactics. Knight, swordsman, archer, skeleton, mage, catapult and much more hero are ready to fight for you.

name: Poop Killer 8
description: The poop killer now strikes in the middle of Christmas... smellier and deadlier. Embark on this shitty adventure and try not to end up with poop stuck in your mouth. With three meaningless endings...

name: The Life of Me
description:
The story revolves around Oliver, an eighteen-year-old man who has just moved back to the town he grew up in. Amidst old friends and new acquaintances, he learns about the world of grown-ups; responsibilities, sexual exploration, and that everyone has secrets they wish to keep hidden.

Will he find love, uncover his friends' secrets, or just learn to enjoy what the world has to offer?

name: The Lightshield Report
description:
Alan works in Sentient Resources for the Dark Lord Xysryhfrx, and it appears multiple monsters in the underdungeon have claimed to have killed Gordon Lightshield, mid-level hero, in order to claim the eon-end bonus.

Ask each of the claimants what their story is, and provide the Dark Lord with a report as to who actually got the kill, and deserves the bonus.

name: Catch'em
description: You've got all the evidence, now just one thing left, the real puzzle at the heart of this case, the final face off against the Killer

name: Many Crimes of Serenity Falls
description:
You are Ashley Rose, a brilliant detective about to enjoy her long overdue vacation in a remote mountainous village: Serenity Falls.

Of course, your getaway gets interrupted. Of course, there was a murder.

A child is found dead, circumstances are mysterious, and every damn person in this town has something to hide

Look for clues, interrogate townsfolk, and deduce conclusions in this retro-style detective mystery puzzle!

name: Implication
description:
Collect evidence and build cases against suspects to convince a jury of their peers to convict. Will you search hard for the real criminal? Or will you point the finger at someone else for your own benefit?

What comes first? Money? Happiness? Reputation? Justice? Play through each case to find out what becomes of you, your career, and your community.

name: Dead Cards
description:
WELCOME IN DEAD CARDS !

Each game, a card is killed in a deck a card. The killer is always the card that was on top of the victim in the card game. Find the truth by questioning each card, which will give you clues as to their position in the deck. Only one card lie, it's the murderer! Investigate and find to incoherence to put it in jail.

name: Valor
description: Sin descripción

name: Welcome to Silverscale Lake!
description: A small-town mystery set in a "mundanely magical" modern-day/very near future world with science-fantasy elements, taking place over the course of 9 days. Figure out the truth behind the tragic disaster that shut down the magi-tech factory 20 years ago.

name: Wrongly Accused
description:
Wrongly Accused is a Case of the Golden Idol inspired murder mystery in the vein of Columbo... more of a How-Dunnit than a Whodunnit.

Set during the Years of Lead in 1970s Italy, an attempted assasination attempt on the mayor may not be what everyone thinks. The main suspect Tony has all the evidence pointing at him but maybe it's all a little too convenient.

name: Risk of Rain: Hostile Worlds
description: Risk of Rain: Hostile Worlds is a mobile adaptation of Risk of Rain, providing a familiar gameplay style with ARPG and run-and-gun elements. Assemble your squad, secure precious loot, and decimate relentless hordes of enemies!

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzles - Cat Family Christmas
description: Experience the pure magic of Christmas through the eyes of a lovable family of red fluffy kittens in this enchanting tale of festive joy and heartwarming discovery! 34 picture!

name: Soul of Butterflies: The Lobby
description: "Soul of Butterflies: Incubation" is a point-and-click adventure game with a unique worldview. Players will take on the role of Anders and explore an extremely enigmatic inn as they unveil the world's hidden reality.

name: Escape From The Island
description: story mode and survival mode

name: 765 Suika
description: A Suika Game-inspired game featuring characters from The Idolmaster franchise.

name: Warlocks Deeds: Desolation horde
description: In Desolation Horde, you are cast into a barren world devoid of any structures. This survival-driven variant demands meticulous resource management to stay alive. Periodical waves of ferocious, ever-increasing enemies will descend upon you, determined to claim your demise.

name: Air Fight: Sky Fighters
description: Prepare to take to the skies in an adrenaline-pumping adventure like no other with "Air Fight - Sky Fighters." Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding world of aerial combat, where you'll pilot cutting-edge fighter jets through intense dogfights and exhilarating missions that will test your skills, reflexes, and strategic thinking.

name: The Dragon, Thyme
description:
The Dragon, Thyme is a 3D Action Platformer with RPG elements. As a fox-eared adventurer named Paprika, you'll run, jump, and swing through beautiful and treacherous lands along with your dragon companion, Thyme. Defeat the forces of Chaos and collect mystical Hourglasses to bring Order back to the world.

Platforming - Use platforming abilities inspired by classic 3D platformers including, wall running, double jumping, and swinging from your Grapple Sword!

Thyme the Dragon - Fight alongside your constant companion, Thyme the Dragon! Collect shards of the elements themselves from your fallen foes to empower Thyme, allowing them to fight using the powers of fire, water, air, and many more!

Explore - Damaged by the tides of Chaos, the lands surrounding Aromata have become perilous. You and Thyme will need every resource at your disposal to survive! Hidden within the fractured lands and toxic swamps are the relics of Aromata's citizens. By recovering these Trinkets and summoning them back, you'll be able to use their services to upgrade your gear!

The Dragon Thyme is a student project developed by the team at Panda Castle. The game features 9 unique levels to explore and 6 elements, each with type advantages against one another and abilities for Paprika to harness.

name: Gravico
description:
In this falling block puzzle game, position your pieces wisely to make clusters of 4+ blocks of the same color. The bigger the cluster, the more points you'll get. Most importantly, if you manage to chain cluster destructions with the fall of the blocks, you'll multiply your points.

Three different modes are available (after being unlocked), each one having a different rhythm.

name: Pokémon Reminiscencia
description: Pokémon Reminiscence is a Pokémon fangame created by Elena Vidad and Max. All Pokémon available up to 9th generation and Roguelike and Roguelite mechanics that increase replayability!

name: News Reacts: Special Operation 1
description: One more mission,

name: The Wheel
description: Sin descripción

name: Loose or Escape
description: Loose or Escape is a multiplayer (4 vs 1) funny game where one player takes on the role of the Boss and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to find all the items and escape the terror. If the Boss catches them, their abilities are disabled and they are transformed in a snowman

name: Offroad VR
description: Offroad VR combines challenging physics-based offroad driving with virtual reality, offering an exciting game that allows players to explore diverse tracks with different vehicles.

name: The Red Beret
description: This is a story that happened during World War II. As the only survivor of the mission, you need to survive on the island and eliminate the Super Mutants and Nazi Germans

name: The Black Guards of Odom: Desert Town Prison
description: You just joined the guards in Odom, a border town full of merchants, travelers, and shady individuals. Soon enough, you'll start climbing the ranks and getting the many perks of a successful career. How far will your ambitions take you?

name: Hot Hatch Adventure
description: You play as a retired rally racing car, transported to a different world where you gain a soul. There, you encounter goblins, dwarves, elves, and tree spirits, embarking on thrilling adventures alongside them!

name: S.E.X. Retreat: WellCum In!
description: Welcome to the fascinating world of S.E.X. Retreat: WellCum In!, a visual novel for adults! Immerse yourself in a captivating story where the main character, tired of failures and searching, decides to start a new chapter in a different spa.

name: Cats Huddled Together
description: There are many cats here, come and take a look!

name: Never be Afraid: Slam Dunk!
description: Never be afraid to Slam Dunk!

name: Survive Planet Yubglub
description: Survive Planet Yubglub is a survival rouge-lite, where Earth Representatives must hurl dodgeballs while evading toxic slime aliens and their lethal projectiles. The Earth Reps. must carefully navigate through the harsh environment of planet Yubglub. Choose your character, and Survive Planet Yubglub!

name: Don't Shoot Us
description: Don't Shoot Us is a solo FPS that tells the story of a tactical soldier from the point of view of his body camera. Try to survive as long as possible against the hordes of infected of all kinds.

name: My Academy's Special Place
description: Our hero's homeroom teacher is also his big sister, Yaeka. She's popular with the students, but at home, she's a slobbish drunk. There's Maika, an exchange student and Akiba nerd. She's always asking him to go to Akiba with her. But Maika is told to return home. Two love stories are about to begin!

name: PortalSnake
description: Puzzle game about portals and snakes.

name: Mature Comedy Visual Novel
description: Experience a world filled with awful people - and you're one of them! You embark on a journey to get your awful catgirl girlfriend some illicit materials, intense and prolonged misery immediately ensues.

name: Kon's Lesson!
description: She was sealed for a thousand years… but now she’s living with you! Fulfill your contract with her by completing her lessons and feeding her “energy” in this cute ‘n steamy romantic comedy game!

name: Meeting Her
description: Meeting Her is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel. You play as Eric, an adult man who already has a life with friends until a new girl appears in his door. The game contains animated sex scenes with all the girls, But you can pick your path, what girl do you would like to be with? it is your choose.

name: Metania
description: Metania is an Indie Psyhological Horror game uses Physics to pass obstacles Interaction with lights Objects doors furniture etc.

name: Hedgehot: Battle Strike
description: Turn-based strategy card game where you use different creatures and spells to defeat your enemies.

name: Hazordhu
description: Delve into the low-fantasy medieval lands of Hazordhu, where you will explore a vast open world full of dangers and wonders where every building and every item is player-made, and the online world changes based on your actions.

name: The Super Pie Throwing
description:
Princess Rosa is mad…. And her maids are gonna pay!!! After a tragic dessert mishap, everything falls apart.

The Super Pie Throwing is a slapstick action mini game where you throw pies, avoid weights, play red light green light, and all other sorts of things to earn HUGE POINTS!!! Try challenge mode for a variety of challenges and obstacles that change the core gameplay and push your skills! Or, if you want to just jump in for a quick match, try Time Attack and Score Attack!

30 unique challenges, various unlockables, funny faces, and more!!!

name: Party Stars
description: Party Stars is the ultimate party game where the fun never stops! Explore countless exciting maps here! Whether you crave sliding waterways during the summer, unveiling secrets hidden among mysterious stones or navigating complex tubes in the air!

name: Legend of Lu: Remastered
description:
Relive the classic in this amazing updated experience with “Legend of Lu: Remastered”. It's the same ol’ capybara you loved from way back when but with new updated graphics and extra digital content for you to enjoy.

Follow the journey of the martial arts fighter Luis the Capybara to save his (retiring) Master!

name: Archipelago Explorer
description:
Your sailing ship has been drifting with the tide for weeks - there is no wind.

Finally you dropped anchor near a chain of islands that you recognise - the Biuso Archipelago. The only information you have about the area is an unfinished book from one of your former shipmates.

You have been chosen to go ashore, figure out which island you’re on, and scope out possible water and food supplies.

name: Ifu
description:
South Africa, 1900: A man is brought to a field hospital wounded and on the verge of death. A volunteer nurse saves him.

A point and click game of memory and deduction. Thematically, it is an exploration of trauma and forgiveness. The game takes place in an alternate history version of the Second Boer War/South African War

name: Primo Richards: Case 1
description: Detroit's number one detective in his first case! Play the role of Primo Richards as he solves the murder of a rich debutante in the city. Filled with an abundance of characters, locations, clues, twists and turns, you are challenged with finding the true culprit in the mystery.

name: Vampire! At the Masquerade
description: You are Mircalla Karnstein, a ███ year old sapphic vampire on the hunt for the feminine comforts of your next dream girl/juice box. With the help of your vampiric servants, you go undercover to infiltrate a masquerade to look hot, overhear gossip, and use your brains to sweet talk a special lady into finding somewhere more private to have a “conversation”…

name: Little Shops of Murder
description: There was a murder in a small town. The police ask you and your team for help.

name: AllYourArdu
description: SHMUP game for the Arduboy meme jam with references to Zero Wing

name: Derby Madness
description: Sin descripción

name: Maneuver Warfare: Mission Pack West 44-45
description: This mission pack adds a series of operations set in Western Europe in 1944-45 where your battle group will engage Allied forces advancing from Normandy to the Elbe.

name: The Failure of Aniconfuku: Convention Murder Episode
description:
Unlike many internet-founded projects, this convention was successful. But close to the end of the second day, someone was found dead in convention hall C. People reported to the local police, and all suspects were gathered in the police station.

And now, Here you are.

name: Santa Gift Master
description: Christmas time is so magical... but Santa Claus is in big trouble! All the presents have fallen off the sleigh and now Santa needs to get them to the right places.

name: Hermit
description: Hermit is a card game that reimagines the classic "Solitaire" with new mechanics designed to enhance player choice and strategic depth.

name: Park Beyond: Chicken Run - Dawn of the Nugget: Theme World
description:
Welcome the Chickens to Park Beyond! Decorate your dream park in the style of Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget, with new scenery items, flat rides, entertainers, two new maps and more.
Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget - Theme World includes the following content:
• 13 Building Prefabs
• 280+ Scenery Objects
• 6 Animatronics
• 2 Flat Rides & their Impossification
• 3 Entertainers
• 1 Track Type
• 6 Coaster Cars
• 2 Modules
• 2 Sandbox Maps

name: Cosmo Dreamer & Like Dreamer: Double-D Collection
description: Cosmo Dreamer & Like Dreamer: Double-D Collection contains two Japanese shoot 'em up arcade games in one collection with a unique art style and easy to hard difficulties.

name: Miss Paint
description: "Miss Paint" is a puzzle platformer game that takes place inside a nostalgic computer interface where you can use image editing tools such as rotate, resize, copy, move, and rectangle to edit the levels themselves and lead Miss Paint to victory by touching the color green!

name: Minion Masters: Mountain Song
description:
The Mountain Song DLC is a great +300% value bundle to empower your clan of Stoutheart! You also get a headstart in the Season Pass!

Includes:
- 3x Urclaw, Protector of the Peaks (Legendary card)
- 20x Frostberry Bearer (Supreme card)
- 20x Snap Freeze
- 40x Highland Huntress
- 40x Woodsman
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 3 Arsenal Pack
description: Meet Your Maker's Sector 3 Arsenal Pack introduces a powerful new weapon and an insidious new trap to your arsenal. Venture through the war-torn acid wastes, to Fort Hope, and witness humanity's failed attempt at preserving the planet's Genetic memory.

name: Train Simulator Classic: ÖBB 8073
description: Get ready to board the ÖBB 8073 from RSSLO for CityShuttle passenger services.

name: Super Ninja Bundle
description: Save 20% with the bundle of two games "Super Ninja Miner" and "Perfect Ninja Painter"

name: Ballotron Coolbox
description:
Feel the coolness of Christmas in the new part of Ballotron!
Shoot Small Balls to hit Large Balls.
Connect 2 large balls to complete levels.
Break piles of ice and enjoy the atmosphere of winter, presents and holidays.

name: Murder in the Snow Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:

- Yuletide Legends: Who Framed Santa Claus
- Modern Tales: Age of Invention
- Enigmatis 3: The Shadow of Karkhala

name: Apocalypse Party & 20 Minutes Till Dawn: Free Thanking DLC
description: This thrilling free DLC combines with "20 Minutes Till Dawn's" strategic depth. Cross-game heroes infuse "Apocalypse Party" with tactics and abilities. With three innovative weapons and talents, players now have more ways to combat and strategize in this end-of-days showdown.

name: AirportSim: Rovaniemi Airport
description: Welcome to Rovaniemi Airport! This new airport for AirportSim, which is nestled in the heart of Finnish Lapland, is not just an ordinary airport; it's the gateway to the magical home of Santa Claus and a bridge to the Arctic wonders.

name: Soul of Sovereignty: Prelude
description:
Soul of Sovereignty is a visual novel of deadly kindness and selfish virtue in a world of magic and ruin.

Story and music by ggdg (Cucumber Quest), featuring tracks by Toby Fox (Undertale, Deltarune).

name: Hentai Golf
description: Experience the best date ever and become champion in golf with little help from beautiful girls!

name: One Night: Burlesque - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Jolly RPG
description: It's Christmas season and our pink-haired protagonist needs to buy a gift for a friend. Luckily for him, the newest mall in town has just opened! Together with his other friend, he decides to shop there. However, the mall's owner has an evil plan for that place...?! When a blackout occurs and locks our protagonists inside just as they finish buying gifts, they must venture further into the mall to find out what exactly is going on, and how to get back home in time for Christmas!

name: Emergency Christmas
description: Santa got dead and you have to infiltrate the illuminati before they make evil santas something something save christmas and shoot stuff you know how it goes figure it out.

name: Dreams of Saturn
description: Dreams of Saturn is a Shenmue Xmas fan game from George Kitchen. The game features around 10-15 hours worth of content in the form of a short Shenmue story, taking place before and after the events of the original Shenmue, along with a wide variety of mini-games, achievements and more.

name: Dungeon Ascension
description: The conclusion of Chuma's original map saga.

name: A Very Pilkington Christmas
description: 2D pixel art fan game for Karl Pilkington.

name: Spanky's Quest DX
description: The Natsume’s Game Boy classic, now in full color! Enjoy this cute single screen arcade platformer with a new beautiful coat of paint!

name: Retro Collection 1
description: This bundle brings together Flashback - a classic game that has been ranked in the top 100 of the best games many times - but also Operation Wolf Returns: First Mission - the iconic Rail Shooter released for Arcade back in 1987 - and Arkanoid: Eternal Battle, the emblematic block breaker game in a fully modernized version!

name: Trinity Fusion: Deluxe Edition
description: Explore dark, sci-fi worlds and engage in fast-paced and precise combat in Trinity Fusion - a Rogue-Lite action platformer set in a sprawling, doomed multiverse.

name: Train Traffic Manager: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Yensen The Boostmaster
description: Sin descripción

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic Dancing Night, Merry Night All in Pack
description: This DLC includes the following content: 【Costume】 Kitty Santa Set Graceful Santa Set 【Hair parts】 Mini French Braid Hair Set Refined Hair Set (Refined Ribbon included) 【Dance】 Night Magic Fire CUSTOM ORDER MAID Premium medley

name: FPV Kamikaze Drone
description: "FPV Drone Kamikaze" is a fast-paced action game where players control a combat drone from a first-person perspective. The objective is to destroy enemy equipment in war using maneuvers and explosive devices. Speed and strategy will be the keys to victory.

name: Occult Crime Police: Medium at Large
description: The sequel to Occult Crime Police. Boomtown, USA is visited by a spirit medium who claims to be able to solve the case which ruined Sheriff Miranda Warren's life seven years ago. Everyone in town has a reason to be upset about the upcoming seance, but could someone be upset enough... to kill? Explore the set of a ghost hunt, uncover evidence to reveal the truth, and interrogate rude and/or stupid witnesses to unravel a mystery that defies the very laws of reason!

name: Dave the Diver: Dredge
description:
Encounter charactes and aberrations from the enigmatic fishing adventure game DREDGE, in Dave the Diver!

Turn aberrant fish into sushi to feed the hooded figures!

On days when the red fog rolls in you can take direct control of the boat and go to the aberrant fish habitat!

name: Gallery Gunner
description: Sin descripción

name: Cyan Avenger
description: This is a game that combines bullet evasion, flying shooting, and rhythm music gameplay. There is a unique way of storytelling. You can enjoy the joy of fighting against other spacecraft from a 2D perspective, accompanied by music. The game level belongs to small games.

name: Jisatsu
description: Jisatsu is a Japanese found footage mockumentary horror game.

name: Dark Sun
description: Accompany a wanderer through their dying world while they prepare to sacrifice their life to save it.

name: Pigbook
description: A short metroidvania platformer game about a small island of pigs drawn in an worldly events of a new world ruled by a Corporation of a Dragon.

name: WhiteTrick
description: WhiteTrick is a turn-based multiplayer board game that pits police officers against second-hand dealer fraudsters. White evades the police and commits additional crimes. And the police deployed to prevent his further crimes investigate, find clues, guess his route, and apprehend White!

name: KillFish
description: Welcome to KillFish. In this Action/FPS game, you'll dive into a captivating world where robots have taken control on a factory. Embark on an epic adventure filled with a unique hook mechanic that will give you freedom to explore and kill in flashy ways.

name: Dire: Flesh and Phobia
description: Embark on an epic roguelike adventure in "Dire:Flesh and Phobia", where visually spectacular monsters engage in intense card battles. Craft your deck, navigate immersive maps, and conquer foes, culminating in epic boss battles. With unique abilities, strategic deck building, and stunning visuals, Dire:Flesh and Phobia is a thrilling journey to become the ultimate monster master. Are you ready to face the challenge and claim victory in this visually captivating world?

name: Reign of the Renegade
description: Reign of the Renegade is a challenging roguelike deckbuilder. Learn Actions, Collect Artifacts, and level up your Character to make powerful synergies.

name: Remove
description: Let’s recall the memory before the accident and erase the traces of your crime.

name: The Bou: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Wanting Wings
description: At Seiyou Girls' academy, there are rumors of an angel. Roommates Hina, Rin, and Fumi all have completely different personalities, but they all experienced 1 strange event: They all once saw an angel in their youth. They gradually begin to suspect that one of their roommates might be that angel.

name: Speed Night
description: Late at night, a young driver was driving his beloved sports car on the road. When he passed a bus stop, I found a girl being bullied by some hooligans. He stopped the car...

name: Spellz: Mastery or Death
description: Spellz is a medieval rogue-lite where deep mastery of your spells and split-second decisions are essential to survival. Your arduous training will call for dexterity, parrying, dodging and, above all, hundreds upon hundreds of deaths... to unlock a whole range of new spells and runes.

name: Farm Land: Kitty Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Soul's Remnant
description: "Soul's Remnant" is a social and player-driven 2D platformer MMORPG.

name: Katana Robo: RTA
description: Katana Robo fights his way to the top floor of the Robot Tower, which looks like a platformer game stage, to thwart Samurai Robo's ambitious plan to use the Dominion Sphere at the top of the Robot Tower to control the robots throughout the universe.

name: Good Morning Cruel City
description: Anime Cyberpunk Visual Novel You have a job, it's up to you how to finish it. Become a Fixer and help your client for the day navigate the underground crime world.

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles
description: "Explore USA's beauty in Jigsaw Puzzles! Solve iconic scenes, unlock breathtaking views, and experience America's charm. Choose your challenge and enjoy a captivating tribute to the nation's splendor!"

name: Emergency Call: The Attack Squad
description:
Take on the role of the attack squad, explore the scene and work through the challenges in a reasonable way.

The unclear damage situation at the beginning of every scene, whether it is fires, rescue of people or technical assistance requires your attention. Keep in mind that the choice of the right tools is just as important as a reasonable tactical order you have to decide on, when exploring and working through the operations.

name: Heatchain
description: Arcade game where you need to find the next glyph to make the longest chain

name: Last Moor
description: Last Moor is a horror game in which a man wakes up and escapes from a secret laboratory on the moon. You have to escape by solving various puzzles, exploring the laboratory, avoiding or fighting the monsters there.

name: Tochos vs. Brokens
description: The Brokens are invading and only you can save the planet, use your Tochos and defeat the evil forces in this strategic tower defense game.

name: Neoathlon
description: A sci-fi racing title aimed at being a highly polished and fun experience for players and spectators alike. Neoathlon utilizes style and substance with its custom physics mechanics to make the most robust and enjoyable hover racing experience possible.

name: Ancient Russian Life Simulator
description: An exciting clicker game that will allow you to plunge into the times of the war of the Ancient Rus against the Lizards, stand next to your ancestors to protect the Russian land!

name: House of Lizards
description: Unique Ancient Rus Simulator with Horror Elements. Get Intelligence for Slavic Brothers, return to the base Ancient Russian Manuscripts, drink Baikal Water and Destroy the base of Lizards!

name: History of Meme Essence
description: Hardcore platformer, challenging gameplay. The game tells the story of the Meme Essence, which was awakened after Bebe the Ram seized power in the kingdom.

name: Speak of the Devil I: A Deathly Proposition
description: Experience the impact of making a pact with a demon in this linear visual novel, where the consequences can be life-changing in an instant. Michi, the main character, has the chance to pursue a romantic relationship with any of the female characters, including the demon he made a deal with.

name: Zombie Defense: Commando Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Z Escape: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Rush GT: NY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Collectors Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Knights & Guns: NY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Poly Shooting Simulator
description: Are you ready to dominate the leaderboard and become the ultimate Poly Shooting legend?

name: Simulator Z
description: A world where you can create your own zombie apocalypse to your liking!

name: Walpurgis Raid
description: Prepare yourself for Roguelite bullet-hell battles! Dive into a magic world to sets out on the royal battle. Upgrade your witch and transform into an unstoppable force, obliterating enemies in epic combat showdowns. Brace yourself for a survival match like no other!

name: Whispering Paws
description: Embark on a poignant journey with Whispering Paws, a 3D adventure where you guide a determined fox to reunite its family. Explore enchanting landscapes, solve puzzles, and immerse yourself in a heartfelt narrative. Discover the magic within nature's embrace.

name: Survivor Girls
description: "Survivor Girls" is a roguelite which is about pretty girls and added a variety of strategic ways based on the traditional roguelike,13 different characters available plus hundreds of weapons and items bring the game more possibilities.

name: Shockwaves
description: Shockwaves is an online shooter game where music has an impact on the gameplay. The main game mode is 8 vs 8 point capture. Items that are gained when playing can be traded by players on the open market.

name: Reckless Rally
description: Reckless Rally Is A Small Casual Rally Racing Game. Try And Set A PB On The Two Tracks Or Build Your Own Based Off Real World Roads!

name: Yeetus
description: You are YEETUS! Your weapon? The very floor beneath your feet! YEET your surrounding terrain into destructive projectiles. Be strategic, though. A hasty shot may mean a long fall down to your doom in YEETUS, a casual time survivor game with rogue-lite elements.

name: Bwudaling: Da Fight for da Bwudahood
description: The game nobody wanted but everyone needed. The evil Twent has attacked, bringing his minions with him, as well as hundreds of saws to block your path. Dodge, duck, dip, dive, and dodge to prove your love for Bwuda as you track Twent down to his evil lair, and finish him once and for all.

name: RGBounce
description: A Challenging and fast-paced 3D platformer where you have to navigate through the levels by matching your color with the color of the platform

name: Cheesecake Cult: Unholy Feast
description: "In this spine-chilling adventure, you will delve into the eerie world of a cult that worships a sinister deity through the creation and consumption of blasphemous cheesecakes. As the protagonist, you must navigate through a nightmarish maze of secrets, rituals, and unspeakable horrors to unravel the truth and escape with your sanity intact. Did I mention you are being followed by the cult leader?"

name: Soul Street
description: Psychic Sleuth: Street of Falling Souls is a deductive adventure game that combines narrative and puzzle solving, with rational reasoning to obtain relevant and important information to advance the story and unravel the truth of the case, as well as the mysterious forces behind the organisation.

name: StairCase 55
description: An atmospheric psychological horror game that plunges you into an anomalous, paradoxical stairwell. Equipped only with a flashlight, navigate through the abyss of the procedurally generated staircase, haunted by an ever-adapting presence. Unravel the mystery of SCP-087.

name: Split Polarity: The Science Puzzle Arcade Game!
description: Get ready Scientists, things are about to get crazy! The atoms have become unstable, so it's your job to guide the highly volatile particles into the black holes. Play against friends in local multiplayer in Versus Mode, or attempt a high score in the Labyrinth.

name: Bockito
description: In Bockito you'll have to fight against a horde of hostile pine cones and other enemies. To do this, equip yourself with different items, learn abilities and combine them into different builds to survive.

name: Conspyration
description: ConSPYration is a spy-themed, LOCAL multiplayer game for up to 6 players. Your goal is to steal the briefcase and reach for the exit, but beware, eveyr stage is full of perils and the rival spies won't let you escape so easy!

name: Slime Wars
description: Slime Wars is a cooperative multiplayer game that combines elements of the Top Down Shooter and Party-Games genre. The game recreates an arena capable of supporting up to 4 players simultaneously, in which players must face enemies in frenetic combat.

name: I Commissioned Some Letters
description: I paid more artists to hide letters and stamps in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: My Slow Life with the Princess Knight and Her Devoted Handmaiden
description: Garland used to be a formidable adventurer... But then he was betrayed and left for dead. Now he has a reputation as the Dragon Survivor and no one left in the world he can rely on. When he brings two beautiful servants into his life to tend his wounds, will he learn to open his heart again?

name: Evoland 1 & 2: 10th Anniversary Edition
description:
Contents of the 10th Anniversary Edition:

- Evoland 1 & 2: Immerse yourself in two games that marked the history of independent gaming by exploring the evolution of graphics and gameplay through different eras of video games.
- 4 Exclusive Pieces: Get collector’s items that celebrate EVOLAND’s decade.
- Stickers: Decorate your play space with themed stickers.
- Post card : Enjoy an exclusive postcard with original illustrations.
- Soundtrack (Dematerialized): Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of EVOLAND with the game’s soundtrack.
- Certificate of authenticity : Receive a certificate attesting to the authenticity of this limited edition.

name: FarWest Colony
description: Lead a rebellion against tyranny in this open-world, survival sci-fi RPG game. Utilize alien technology to explore, build bases, craft, and farm. Prepare for an unequal combat to rescue humanity from tyranny and a mysterious deadly virus.

name: That Damn Goat
description: A chaotic multiplayer party game where the world, and your character, is constantly changing. Battle to keep control of the crown all while That Damn Goat does everything in its (omnipotent) power to get in the way.

name: Zeitghast
description: Run, dash, shoot, and slash your way through a mechanized prehistoric world in this fast paced platformer-shooter. Keep your eye on the clock while trying to stop an evil mad scientist from disrupting the timeline!

name: Mimi the Cat: Meow Together
description: Help Mimi and her friends move, climb, or carry boxes to reach their beds and rest. Alone or in multiplayer, unlocking adorable new cats and being able to play with them in this challenging sokoban-like game!

name: Turbo Chicken Simulator
description: Turbo Chicken Simulator is an immersive, open-world action RPG. It is the latest and greatest in high-tech Chicken Simulation technology.

name: Paper Flight: Future Battles
description: Paper Flight – Future Battles is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. Jump into the role of a little paper plane and rescue the world from evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: One-Armed Robber
description: One-armed robber is a chaotic first-person heist game that centers around a uniquely challenging premise. Players take the role of a determined robber equipped with only one arm, tasked with pulling off daring heists on banks, shops, and various establishments.

name: Magnet Mania 3D
description: Magnet Mania 3D, it's a simulation game for small and big engineers, school children to learn about magnetism and physics.

name: Error143 DLC
description: Following Micah's arrival to your room, you go on dates! Play his specially curated game for you until morning rise, go star gazing together, and howl at the moon! Have some late night talks and just...enjoy each other's presence.

name: HoneyFury
description: Base Construction and Strategic Card Management. You will construct and defend your base from enemy invasions. Employ clever layouts to enhance your base's defenses and acquire resources through card management. Get ready to embrace this strategic and thrilling honey-fueled frenzy!

name: Orcish Skies
description: Orcish Skies blends Roguelike deckbuilding, turn-based, Slay The Spire-styled gameplay with a grid-based map. Fire a missile into a cluster of enemies. Rain down lightning on an enemy Carrier from afar. Fly past a swarm of frigates to pick off the sniper shooting you from across the map.

name: Demons of Asteborg/Astebros
description: Discover the legends of Asteborg in two fantastic 16-bit games for Evercade. Fight back the demon invasion in Demons of Asteborg, and discover the origins of Asteborg in the roguelite platform adventure Astebros.
